title: Lead Manager (Real Estate)
description:
About the Role:

The client is the Chief Executive Officer of a Southeast US multifamily property management company overseeing a portfolio of communities across the region. The environment is fast-moving, performance-driven, and built around occupancy, responsiveness, and resident experience.



Leads matter. Speed matters. This CEO expects new inquiries to be contacted immediately. The goal is sub-60-second response times after ramp-up. This role is critical to protecting revenue, maximizing tours, and driving conversion.



You own the lead response pipeline end-to-end: first contact, qualification, tour coordination, documentation, and reporting. Property teams rely on clean handoffs and accurate notes. Leadership relies on daily visibility into performance metrics.



Responsibilities:



Own the full lead response and tour booking process across the property portfolio.

Respond to new leasing inquiries within sub-60 seconds through immediate outbound calls and texts using the client CRM

Handle inbound calls and text inquiries, answering questions about pricing, availability, amenities, and application processes

Qualify prospects by identifying move-in timelines, budget, preferred unit type, and household needs

Match prospects to appropriate communities based on availability and criteria

Book property tours through per-property online scheduling portals or coordinate live with on-site property contacts to confirm availability

Maintain detailed call notes, lead status updates, and next-step documentation inside the CRM

Track daily activity including response times, outbound attempts, tours scheduled, and conversions

Generate daily KPI summaries for leadership visibility and performance tracking

Ensure clean, accurate handoff to property teams for confirmed tours and qualified prospects



Requirements:



3+ years of appointment setting, inside sales, or customer service experience, preferably in real estate or multifamily leasing

Clear, neutral-accent English with strong verbal communication suited for Southern US market conversations

Proven ability to maintain urgency and achieve sub-60-second initial response times after a 30-day ramp period

Full-time availability (40 hours per week) aligned with EST schedule

Hands-on experience working inside CRM systems for call/text outreach, activity tracking, and detailed documentation

Experience using online scheduling portals to book appointments with high accuracy

Comfort coordinating directly with on-site property contacts to secure confirmed tour times

Strong documentation discipline and consistency in logging call notes and lead updates

Ability to maintain a natural, unscripted conversational tone while following company guidelines and conversion standards



Benefits:



Competitive salary

Paid US holidays

Paid wellness days

Health & wellness allowance

Monthly profit sharing

AI, Operations, and Leadership upskilling

Dedicated Success Manager and long-term placement support

title: Virtual Sales & Lead Management Assistant
description:
At Developer Launch, we don’t just hire for tasks — we hire for impact.



We build real 8-12 unit multifamily development projects in Edmonton. Our clients invest $350k–$500k+ into ground-up real estate projects.



We generate hundreds of inbound leads daily through
 and Instagram.



We are looking for a sharp, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to manage conversations, nurture leads, and help move prospects toward booked calls with our sales team.



This role is critical to our growth.



This is a position where you can level up to an executive assistant role, earn bonuses on team sales targets, paid travel, dental coverage and much more.



The Mission



Your job is simple in theory:



No leads fall through the cracks.



You will manage inbound DMs, qualify prospects, follow up consistently, and ensure serious prospects get booked onto a call with our closers.



You are not closing deals.



You are managing the front end of the pipeline.



Your Responsibilities:



1. DM & Inbox Management



Monitor
 and Instagram daily



Respond quickly and professionally to inbound messages



Ask qualifying questions



Guide prospects toward booking a call



2. Lead Qualification



Identify serious prospects vs. time-wasters



Ask structured qualifying questions



Tag and categorize leads properly



3. Booking Calls



Send booking links



Confirm scheduled calls



Follow up with no-shows



Reschedule when needed



4. CRM Management



Update CRM daily



Input notes from conversations



Track follow-ups



Keep pipeline organized



5. Follow-Up System



Follow up with warm leads who didn’t book



Re-engage cold leads after set timeframes



Maintain consistent messaging tone



Who We’re Looking For



You are:



Extremely organized



Fast at responding



Comfortable communicating in clear, professional English



Proactive (you don’t wait to be told what to do)



Calm and professional in conversation



Comfortable talking about money and investments



Bonus:



Experience managing DMs for coaches, agencies, or real estate companies



Familiar with CRM systems



Sales support experience



What This Is Not:



Not a content creation job



Not graphic design



Not a passive “check messages once a day” role



Not just answering basic questions



This is an active pipeline management position.



Our Core Values



We value:



Competitive greatness



Sincere candor



Unimpeachable character



Speed and accountability



If you work slowly, avoid responsibility, or need constant reminders — this won’t work.



How to Apply



Please send:



A short video introduction (2–3 minutes)



Your previous experience managing DMs or leads



The CRM tools you’ve used



Your internet speed



Why you think you’d be good at this role



Subject line: Virtual Sales Assistant – [Your Name]

title: GRAPHIC DESIGNER – FACEBOOK & INSTAGRAM ADS – FULL TIME
description:
ABOUT US

ZZ Med Spa is a 5 Star rated Medical Spa based in Manhattan, NY, USA. We operate in a fast paced, high performance environment and continue to expand across multiple Day Spa and Med Spa locations.

We are a growing organization that values professionalism, precision, and excellence in execution. Our team is built with individuals who thrive in dynamic settings and take ownership of their work with a high level of accountability.



ROLE OVERVIEW

We are looking for a skilled Graphic Designer who specializes in creating high converting
 and Instagram ad creatives.

This role is focused specifically on paid social ad design. You will be responsible for developing scroll stopping visuals that generate leads and bookings. This is not a general admin or VA role. We are seeking someone who understands marketing psychology and performance driven design.

Experience creating short form video ads or reels is a strong plus, but the primary focus is static and carousel ad creatives.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

• Design high converting
 and Instagram ad creatives

• Create static image ads and carousel variations

• Develop multiple creative versions for A/B testing

• Maintain brand consistency across all marketing materials

• Organize and manage design files efficiently

• Collaborate with the team to refine creatives based on performance



REQUIREMENTS

• Minimum 3 years of experience designing paid social media ads

title: Kajabi + Content Operations Specialist (Part-Time, Long-Term Potential)
description:
I run an online guitar coaching and course business and I’m looking for a highly competent, detail-oriented Content Operations Specialist to help me manage video production workflow and Kajabi implementation.



This is NOT a general VA role.



I am looking for someone who executes cleanly, follows detailed SOPs, communicates clearly, takes ownership of quality, and catches mistakes before I do.



You will be helping me during a focused 3–4 month content production sprint, with strong potential for long-term work if it’s a great fit.



MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES



Video Production Support:

(1) Edit lesson videos (trim mistakes, tighten pauses, clean flow).

(2) Improve audio quality (noise reduction and leveling).

(3) Ensure guitar and voice are balanced.

(4) Export and name files consistently.

(5) Upload videos into Kajabi.

(6) Format lesson descriptions and summaries.

(7) Link PDFs, tabs, and resources.

(8) Flag anything unclear or inconsistent.



This is clean, professional editing. It is not cinematic editing.



Kajabi Implementation:

(1) Upload lessons and organize modules.

(2) Format lesson pages consistently.

(3) Implement
 automations (with guidance).

(4) Update offer pages and content pages.

(5) Maintain clean structure inside Kajabi.

(6) Follow clear step-by-step SOPs.



Kajabi experience is helpful but not required if you are highly comfortable learning new platforms quickly.



WHAT I AM LOOKING FOR

(1) Strong English comprehension (near-native preferred).

(2) Comfortable editing video (Descript, Premiere, CapCut, etc.).

(3) Detail-oriented and organized.

(4) Able to follow detailed instructions exactly.

(5) Comfortable learning new software quickly.

(6) Reliable and communicative.

(7) Able to work independently without constant supervision.



I care deeply about clean execution. I do not want to micromanage or fix frequent mistakes.



HOURS

Starting 4–8 hours per week with potential to increase over time. Long-term opportunity for the right person.



TO APPLY

Please answer the following:

(1) What video editing software do you use?

(2) Describe your process for ensuring quality control when editing.

(3) Have you worked inside Kajabi or a similar platform before?

(4) How do you handle tasks when instructions are detailed and structured?

(5) Provide 2 examples of similar work.

(6) In your subject line, write: Precision First

title: Short-Form Video Editor — AI Content Creator, Instagram/TikTok
description:
JOB TITLE: Short-Form Video Editor — AI Content Creator, Instagram/TikTok

SALARY: $1,100 USD/month

TYPE: Full-time (40 hours/week)

LOCATION: Remote (Philippines)

SCHEDULE: Async, with Vancouver overlap (PST) for feedback



---



THE MISSION



Prismiera is a luxury jewelry brand with a short-form video series already producing cinematic content on YouTube — mythology, history, goddess archetypes, and Dark Academia aesthetics.



We need someone to own the Instagram and TikTok side.



This is NOT repurposing YouTube content into different aspect ratios. This is building platform-native content that makes a woman feel powerful in under 20 seconds. You'll create original short-form edits and cinematic skits using AI-generated footage, voiceovers, and atmospheric visuals — designed from the ground up for how Instagram and TikTok audiences actually consume.



The other half of this role: you'll be working with our AI-generated personas who serve as the visual anchor across our short-form content. You'll generate, composite, integrate, and stylize AI character visuals into edits that feel striking and intentional, not gimmicky. If the idea of building a visual identity around an AI persona excites you, keep reading!



---



THE STYLE



The content mix you'll produce:



65% VIBE & SCENARIO — The kind of reel a woman sends to her group chat with no caption because the vibe speaks for itself.



25% CINEMATIC SKITS — High-end, visually stunning executions of viral formats and dark humor. The premise can be slightly unhinged or ironic, but the visuals never break luxury. Think high-end perfume commercial meets TikTok audio trend. The Goddess is never the butt of the joke — she's the punchline, and she always wins.



10% SENSORY / EXPERIMENTAL — Layered, fast, loop-optimized. Visual overload with mythological texture. The algorithmic wildcard.



YES: Aspirational. Lethal elegance. Fashion-edit energy. Dark femininity. Music-driven impact. Content that feels like a luxury car reel meets ancient mythology. Cinematic skits using our AI personas — high-production value, deadpan, surreal, or darkly ironic.



NO: CapCut presets. Generic motivational quote reels. Low-effort vlog-style acting. Slapstick comedy. Anything that looks like it was made in Canva. Anything that cheapens a demi-luxury product.



---



WHAT YOU'LL DO



Create & Adapt: Produce original Instagram/TikTok-native content using AI-generated visuals, trending audio, and our brand's mythology. Some pieces you'll build from scratch. Others you'll adapt from assets in our YouTube production pipeline. Either way, you're not resizing — you're crafting content shaped for how each platform rewards engagement.



Cinematic Skits: Build short-form skits around our AI personas that use trending formats, dark humor, or deadpan irony — executed at a visual level that never drops below luxury. People share it for the joke, follow the page for the aesthetic.



AI Persona Integration: Composite and stylize our AI-generated characters into edits as a visual anchor. She's not a narrator in your content — she's the presence. The face the eye locks onto while mythology and music layers move around her.



AI Content Generation: You won't just receive AI assets — you'll create them. Using tools like Seedance 2.0 and Seedream, you'll generate goddess visuals, atmospheric environments, and character footage that feed directly into your edits. You're both the director and the editor.



Music-Sync Editing: Your cuts, transitions, and visual reveals are married to the beat. You understand rhythm as a storytelling tool. Swells, drops, silence, impact — all intentional.



Platform Instinct: You understand what Instagram rewards vs. what TikTok rewards. You know what gets saved on IG. You know what gets looped on TikTok. You design for those behaviors, not just for visual quality.



Instagram Packaging: Beyond the Reel itself — you contribute to grid cohesion, caption strategy, and Story sequencing. The profile should make someone think "I want to be part of this" within 2 seconds of landing.



Volume at Speed: Once your templates and aesthetic are locked, your turnaround per piece should be significantly faster than building from zero. We expect high output.



---



CORE REQUIREMENTS



After Effects (Strong Plus). Compositing, layering, motion graphics, light/shadow matching. If you have these skills, they'll set you apart. If you don't, strong AI generation skills and visual instinct can compensate.



Premiere Pro. For project handoffs and consistency with the rest of the team.



AI Generation Fluency. This is not optional. You'll be using frontier AI tools daily — not just editing AI output, but generating it. You'll learn to prompt, iterate, select, and refine AI-generated visuals as a core part of your production workflow. We provide paid accounts for all tools (Seedance 2.0, Seedream, and whatever launches next). What we need is someone who treats these tools as creative instruments, not novelties.



The Aesthetic Eye. You instinctively know the difference between aspirational and try-hard. Between elegant and overproduced. Between powerful and loud. Your edits make people feel something before they consciously understand what they're looking at.



Music & Rhythm. You've made edits where the music drives the visuals — AMVs, fashion reels, phonk edits, fan edits, whatever. You understand pacing as a weapon. You know what "the drop" means and you know when NOT to use it.



Loop Thinking. You design edits that reward rewatching. The cut that lands on beat, the detail you only catch the second time, the seamless loop point. You think in circles, not lines.



Strong English. Daily async communication — clear, direct, professional.



Reliable & Coachable. You hit deadlines or warn early. You take direct feedback and iterate fast. You flag problems with options, not excuses.



---



BONUS SKILLS (Not Required, But We'll Notice)



- Color grading — pushing AI output and mixed footage into a consistent luxury palette

- Typography sense — text overlays that feel intentional and premium

- Sound design — SFX layering beyond just music (risers, hits, atmospheric texture)

- Carousel / static design for Instagram companion posts

- Understanding of Instagram analytics — saves, shares, completion rates, and what drives them

- Experience building visual identities for brands or personas on social media



---



WEEKLY OUTPUT



3–5 pieces as you learn the brand aesthetic, lock your editing templates, learn the AI generation tools, and calibrate with the team.



Steady state: 10–15 pieces per week across Instagram and TikTok — a mix of original productions and asset-based adaptations depending on the content calendar.



---



HOW THIS ROLE FITS



Other editors handle cinematic YouTube production and visual effects — you own social media. Same mythology, same brand, different platform behavior. Each editor has a distinct lane, and yours is how Prismiera looks and feels on Instagram and TikTok.



---



SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS



RAM: 16GB minimum (32GB preferred) + SSD

Reliable high-speed internet (upload speed matters)

Must run video editing software and browser-based AI tools simultaneously



---



PAID TRIAL (Shortlisted Candidates)



Before any full-time commitment, we run a weekly paid trial. We provide real assets from our production pipeline, style references, and the AI persona visuals. You deliver content. Trial is compensated at $250 USD at the end of each week. If it's a mutual fit after 30 days, we transition to regular bi-weekly payments (before work).



This protects both sides — you see whether the work fits your strengths, we see whether the output fits our brand.



---



WHAT WE OFFER



- Paid accounts for all frontier AI tools — Seedance 2.0, Seedream, and whatever launches next

- Creative ownership — you're defining how a luxury brand looks and feels on Instagram and TikTok from day one

- An AI persona to build around — not a hypothetical, an active visual identity you'll shape and evolve

- A role that evolves as the tools evolve — this job will look different in six months, and that's the point

- Clear briefs — asset libraries, mood references, and specific direction for every batch

- Direct feedback — specific, constructive notes on every edit

- A brand worth building — Prismiera launches soon. A second AI-native brand is incubating behind it. You're not joining a finished machine. You're helping build one.



---



COMPENSATION



$1,100 USD/month. Paid trial at $250 USD/week, transitioning to bi-weekly payments of $550 (before work) after 30 days.



---



OWNERSHIP & CONFIDENTIALITY



All outputs (edits, project files, prompts, generated assets, persona visuals) are Prismiera property and must remain confidential.



---



HOW TO APPLY



Do not send a generic cover letter.

Use 7 apply points or more when applying.



Subject line: PRISMIERA SOCIAL — [Your Name]



Send the following (in this order):



1. The Vibe Test. Link to ONE edit you've made that is aspirational, aesthetic, or fashion-adjacent — or a skit that demonstrates platform-native virality instinct. Format doesn't matter. The feeling does.



2. The Rhythm Test. Link to ONE edit where the music drives the visuals. Show us your beat-sync instinct. (Can overlap with #1 if one video demonstrates both.)



3. The Creative Instinct Test (3–5 sentences total). You're given a 45-second cinematic video about a queen who poisoned her entire court, a folder of our AI Goddess visuals, and a dark atmospheric beat. Pitch two reworks: (A) a 15-second Instagram Reel designed to get saved — tell us your audio choice, pacing, and what the first 2 seconds look like; and (B) a 15-second cinematic skit that uses dark or deadpan humor without losing the luxury feel.



4. AI Experience (1–2 sentences). What is your experience level with generative AI tools? If none, say so — we'll evaluate the rest on its own merits.



5. Hardware. Your PC specs: CPU / GPU / RAM. Plus your internet upload speed.



6. Turnaround Estimate. Given existing footage, a music track, and an established editing template — how long would a 15–20 second piece take you?



7. The Rewrite. Rewrite this sentence to sound dark, powerful, and aspirational: "She is really cool and strong and she wins."

title: Telemarketer / Social Media Coordinator
description:
Job Summary



We are seeking a motivated and energetic Telemarketer / Social Media Coordinator to support our marketing and outreach efforts. This role combines outbound calling, lead generation, and social media management to help grow brand awareness, generate qualified leads, and maintain strong communication with potential clients.



The ideal candidate is confident on the phone, organized, creative, and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.



Key Responsibilities

Telemarketing Duties



Make outbound calls to prospective clients using provided lead lists



Introduce company services and generate interest in offerings



Schedule appointments and qualify leads for the sales team



Maintain accurate call notes and updates in CRM systems



Follow up with leads via phone,
, or text messaging



Meet daily and weekly call and appointment-setting goals



Maintain professional and courteous communication at all times



Social Media Responsibilities



Create and schedule social media posts across platforms 
, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.)



Respond to messages, comments, and inquiries in a timely manner



Assist with content creation including captions, graphics ideas, and promotional campaigns



Monitor engagement metrics and recommend improvements



Support brand consistency across all social media channels



Assist with marketing promotions and online campaigns



Qualifications



High school diploma or equivalent required



Previous telemarketing, sales, customer service, or social media experience preferred



Strong verbal and written communication skills



Comfortable making high-volume outbound calls



Familiarity with social media platforms and basic marketing concepts



Basic computer skills (CRM systems,
, scheduling tools)



Self-motivated with strong organizational skills



Skills & Competencies



Excellent communication and persuasion skills



Positive and professional phone presence



Creativity and attention to detail



Time management and multitasking ability



Goal-oriented mindset



Work Environment



Remote 



Flexible scheduling may be available



Performance-based incentives 



Compensation



Hourly pay and/SPIFF's



Bonus opportunities based on performance

title: Long Form Editor (Very easy editing)
description:
Hi, I’m looking for someone to edit long-form videos. The editing will be very simple - I would even describe it more as clip sourcing rather than advanced editing.



The script will be in Polish. You will need to translate the script into English on your own, understand what each line means, and source around 4 B-roll clips per minute. For example, in a 20-minute video, that would be approximately 80 B-roll clips. You will also need to generate a voiceover according to my instructions.



Here is a YouTube channel that creates exactly the type of content I’m referring to. The scripts will already be prepared by me.



This is a full-time position. I’m looking for a few dedicated people because I plan to scale these channels significantly.



The starting pay is $2 per edited minute (around $40 for a 20-minute video). If it turns out that the process is more time-consuming than expected, the rate can be increased - although I don’t anticipate it taking very long.



Please apply only if you can fully commit. I’m looking to hire urgently.

title: Civil Engineer - Canada
description:
Civil Engineer - Remote (Philippines)



Canadian real estate development company | Residential site development | $2,500-3,000 CAD/month for consistent performers



—



WHY JOIN US



Fully remote, permanently. No hybrid, no return-to-office. Work from anywhere.



Predictable hours. 8am-4pm AST means 8am-4pm. No late-night
s, no weekend emergencies.



Clear output = clear reward. No politics, no annual review games. Finish projects well, earn more.



Flat organization. 15-person team of professionals like you. Direct access to leadership. Your ideas get heard.



Continuous training. Collaborative mentality, knowledge sharing, grow your skills without bureaucracy.



—



WHO SHOULD APPLY



If you currently work at (or recently left) Stantec, Arcadis, WSP, AECOM, Jacobs, SMEC, Aurecon, Mott MacDonald, GHD, or Tetra Tech - this role is for you.



Best fit: Residential subdivision, multi-unit site development, land development, municipal servicing. Highway/bridge/heavy civil experience is less relevant.



Not a fit: Estimators, structural engineers, construction supervisors, or field-based roles. We need designers who produce permit-ready civil drawings.



—



YOUR WORK



Site grading and drainage design for residential developments

Utility servicing layouts (water, sewer, storm)

Municipal permit documentation to Canadian standards

Civil 3D production using standardized templates

4-10 projects/month at steady state



—



REQUIREMENTS



2+ years at a global consultancy

Direct experience on Canadian, US, or Australian residential/site projects

Civil 3D proficiency

Licensed engineer (Civil)



—



COMPENSATION AND CONDITIONS



Top performers: $2,500-3,000 CAD/month

Structure: $1,600 base + $
per project

Schedule: Full-time, AST 8am-4pm (8pm-4am Manila)

Time off: Weekends off, one paid vacation day per month

Probation: 1 month



—



HOW TO APPLY



Respond with answers to all five questions. Qualified candidates get one 30-minute interview and immediate onboarding.



1. Employer and Role

Current/recent global consultancy, your job title, and years there.



2. Project Experience

Two residential or site development projects you worked on. Include: location, project type, your deliverables, software used.



3. Workflow

What's your process for producing a grading plan from survey to permit submission? (2-3 sentences)



4. Schedule

Type "YES I CAN COMMIT" for AST 8am-4pm full-time.



5. Portfolio and Start Date

Links to resume and 2-3 civil drawings you produced. How soon can you start?

title: Contract Instructional Designer & Curriculum Developer
description:
Flagship Bilingual Education Certification Program



Role: Lead Certification Developer

Engagement: Contract (15-day development project)

Location: Remote (U.S.)

Language: Fully bilingual (Spanish/English required)

Sector: K-12 Education / Family Engagement / Latino Communities



?



Project Overview



A national bilingual certification program is being developed to support schools in implementing culturally responsive family engagement systems for Latino communities.



This certification is intended for adoption by public and private schools and must meet institutional professional development standards suitable for district implementation.



This is the organization’s first flagship product. It must meet exceptional professional, instructional, and visual quality standards.



?



Role Summary



The Lead Developer will design and produce a complete 6-module bilingual certification program, including curriculum, training materials, toolkits, visual assets, and implementation resources aligned to K-12 school and district needs.



This role works directly with the founder and requires exceptional professionalism, reliability, and execution quality.



?



Core Deliverables



The developer will create:

 • 6-module certification curriculum

 • Facilitator guides

 • Participant workbooks

 • School implementation toolkit

 • Bilingual templates and scripts

 • Training slide decks

 • Visual frameworks and diagrams

 • Certification rubric & assessment

 • Completion certificate design

 • Digital delivery structure



All materials must be institution-ready and suitable for school/district adoption.



?



REQUIRED — Prior Course Development Experience



Applicants must have previously designed:

 • Educator professional development courses

OR

 • Certification programs

OR

 • Institutional training for schools/districts



Portfolio proof is required.

Applications without course design experience will not be considered.



?



Required Expertise



Instructional Design

 • Adult learning theory

 • Educator PD design

 • Competency-based certification

 • Outcomes-aligned curriculum mapping

 • Assessment & rubric design

 • Implementation frameworks



K-12 & Family Engagement Knowledge

 • School family engagement practices

 • Title I family engagement expectations

 • Cultural responsiveness in schools

 • Latino family engagement context

 • Bilingual school communication systems

 • Urban/diverse school settings



Bilingual Capability

 • Professional Spanish writing

 • Professional English writing

 • Bilingual curriculum development

 • Cultural adaptation across languages

 • Authentic Spanish content creation



?



Technical & Design Skills



Curriculum & Document Production

 • Advanced Microsoft Word formatting

 • Google Docs collaboration

 • Professional PDF layout

 • Consistent formatting across materials



Visual & Graphic Design

 • Canva (advanced)

 • Infographics & diagrams

 • Professional slide design

 • Adobe InDesign/Illustrator (preferred)



Digital Learning Structure

 • Online module organization

 • Downloadable resource packaging

 • LMS familiarity (preferred)



?



Professional Qualities Required

 • Exceptional professionalism

 • High integrity and trustworthiness

 • Detail-driven execution

 • Institutional-quality writing

 • Organized workflow

 • Reliable and deadline-consistent

 • Collaborative and responsive

 • Receptive to feedback

 • Able to revise and refine materials



This project requires multiple review and refinement cycles.



?



Work Schedule & Collaboration



The developer must be available for real-time collaboration during U.S. Central Standard Time.



Working hours:

6:00 AM – 2:00 PM (CST)

8 hours per day



Work period:

March 3–7

March 9–13

(March 8 off)



Total duration: 15 days

Total hours: 120



Daily collaboration during these hours is required.



?



Compensation & Payment



Rate: $4 USD per hour

Total hours: 120

Total project pay: $480 USD



Payment method: PayPal

Payment schedule: Weekly payments based on confirmed hours worked



?



Performance Standards



All work must meet institutional education quality suitable for public and private school implementation.



Standards include:

 • Accurate, research-aligned content

 • Professional writing and formatting

 • Clear instructional design

 • High visual clarity

 • Cultural accuracy in Spanish and English

 • Error-free deliverables



Work not meeting standards will require revision.



?



Quality & Revision Expectations



The developer must be open to revisions, adjustments, and refinements based on feedback throughout development.



?



Founder Collaboration & Trust



This role works directly with the founder to build the organization’s first certification product.



The developer must demonstrate:

 • Integrity and professionalism

 • Reliability and follow-through

 • Respect for intellectual property

 • Confidentiality and discretion

 • Ownership mindset

 • Commitment to excellence



?



Confidentiality & Intellectual Property



All materials created are confidential and proprietary.



The selected contractor will be required to:

 • Sign a confidentiality agreement (NDA)

 • Assign all intellectual property rights

 • Not reuse or distribute materials



?



Growth Potential



This certification is the first product in a growing education initiative.



If collaboration is successful and the product launches commercially, there may be opportunities for ongoing work, expansion projects, and long-term collaboration.



?



Selection Process



Step 1 — Mock Project (Required)

Selected applicants complete a small paid sample task demonstrating curriculum design and bilingual writing.



Step 2 — References

Three professional references from prior course or curriculum work required.



Step 3 — Virtual Interview

Final candidates meet virtually with the founder and demonstrate English and Spanish speaking proficiency.



?



Start Date



March 3, 2026



?



Application Requirements



Submit:

 • Resume

 • Course/curriculum portfolio

 • Example educator PD or training created

 • Bilingual writing sample (Spanish + English)

 • Description of similar projects

 • Software proficiency list

 • Confirmation of CST availability

 • Confirmation of compensation agreement

title: Video Editor & Virtual Assistant
description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Video Editor to join my team, who can also function as a Virtual Assistant. This is a full-time position.



The primary responsibility will be video editing, with an initial workload of 7–10 short-form ad videos per week. The focus will be on creating engaging, high-converting short-form video advertisements for
 Ads, Instagram Ads, and TikTok Ads. Since the editing volume is currently manageable, the role will also include Virtual Assistant tasks to support our daily operations.



Video Editing Responsibilities: Editing raw footage into polished, engaging short-form ads. Adding graphics, text overlays, captions, background music, and sound effects. Ensuring all videos are correctly formatted and optimized for each platform. Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or CapCut is required.



Virtual Assistant Responsibilities: Reaching out to content creators for potential collaborations and partnerships. Managing
s and responding to inquiries. Assisting with scheduling, research, and various daily operational tasks as needed.



Requirements: Proven experience as a video editor with a portfolio of short-form or ad content. Strong understanding of what makes a paid ad perform well on social media. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Strong written and verbal English communication skills. Ability to work independently, take initiative, and meet deadlines consistently.



This is a great opportunity for a proactive and creative individual to grow with our brand. If you are a skilled video editor who is also organized and eager to support a growing team, we would love to hear from you.

title: Amazon FBA Product Researcher - Online Arbitrage
description:
In late last year we began selling on Amazon and have already seen tremendous growth. Because of this, we want to bring on help to help in daily tasks and continue growing the business!



We're specifically looking for someone to source amazon products through online arbitrage. Our minimum weekly criteria is 15-20 quality leads that we can purchase.



Pattern wholesale experience is preferred. And the sourcing software's Keepa and SellerAMP will be provided.



Before we hire you, you're required to complete a 3 day trial phase. During this phase you will be paid $1.50 per hour and after the trial phase, we will evaluate and make our hiring decision. After the initial phase your wage will be increased to $3 dollars per hour. After 180 days we will re-evaluate your performance and you will be considered for a raise of your base pay. We want to provide you an opportunity for long-term growth and give you a chance to be rewarded for hard work, with the possibility of managing other VAs as you become more senior.



Bonuses are available on a monthly basis with more leads and more profit leading to a greater bonus. To ensure you're fully reading this, please put Amazon Scaling in your subject line. Everything will be explained to you during our initial call.



Training will be frequent covering new sourcing methods, ways to analyze data, and you will receive feedback on your work. Furthermore, your performance and hours will be tracked with Hubstaff.



In your application please provide your Teams information or your whatsapp information, so I can contact you and schedule a call to review expectations and criteria.

title: HighLevel Onboarding and Coaching Specialist
description:
Job Summary:

The HighLevel Onboarding and Coaching Specialist will be responsible for guiding new clients through the onboarding process and providing ongoing coaching to ensure they successfully recruit clients and/or partners. This role requires a deep understanding of HighLevel software, excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others achieve their business goals.



Key Responsibilities:



Client Onboarding:

Lead clients through the initial setup and configuration of HighLevel software.

Conduct onboarding sessions to familiarize clients with the platform's features and functionalities.

Ensure a smooth transition from setup to active use of the software.

Coaching and Support:



Provide one-on-one coaching to clients, helping them develop strategies to recruit clients and partners using HighLevel.

Offer ongoing support and troubleshooting assistance to address any issues or challenges clients may face.

Develop and deliver training materials, including tutorials, webinars, and guides.

Client Success Management:



Monitor client progress and provide proactive guidance to ensure they are on track to meet their recruitment goals.

Maintain regular communication with clients to assess their needs and provide tailored solutions.

Celebrate client successes and milestones, fostering a positive and motivating experience.

Feedback and Improvement:



Collect feedback from clients to identify areas for improvement in the onboarding and coaching process.

Collaborate with the product development team to suggest enhancements to HighLevel software based on client feedback.

Continuously update and improve onboarding and coaching materials to reflect best practices and new features.

Qualifications:



Proven experience with HighLevel software, including setup, configuration, and advanced features.

Strong coaching and training skills with a demonstrated ability to help clients achieve their goals.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Ability to work independently and manage multiple client relationships simultaneously.

Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to client success.

Experience in sales or recruitment is a plus.



Education and Experience:

Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or a related field (preferred).

At least 2-3 years of experience in client onboarding, training, or coaching roles.

title: Social Media and Video Content Specialist
description:
The Social Media and Video Content Specialist will be responsible for creating, editing, and managing video content across our social media platforms. This role involves enhancing our online presence, increasing our follower base, and boosting engagement through high-quality and compelling content. The ideal candidate will have a passion for storytelling, a keen eye for detail, and a deep understanding of social media trends and strategies.

Key Responsibilities:



Video Editing and Production:



Edit and produce high-quality video content for various social media platforms, including Instagram,
,
, LinkedIn, YouTube, and TikTok.

Collaborate with the marketing team to develop creative concepts and video scripts.

Ensure all video content aligns with our brand guidelines and messaging.

Social Media Management:



Develop and implement social media strategies to increase followers, engagement, and brand awareness.

Manage and monitor all social media accounts, responding to comments and messages promptly.

Schedule and publish posts across all platforms, ensuring consistency and optimal timing.

Content Creation:



Create engaging and visually appealing social media posts, stories, and reels.

Work with graphic designers to develop complementary visual content.

Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and incorporate them into our content strategy.

Analytics and Reporting:



Track and analyze social media performance using analytics tools.

Provide regular reports on follower growth, engagement rates, and other key metrics.

Use data insights to refine and improve content strategies.



Qualifications:

Proven experience as a social media manager and video editor.

Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).

Strong understanding of social media platforms and their algorithms.

Excellent communication and storytelling skills.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Creative mindset with a strong attention to detail.

Knowledge of graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Photoshop) is a plus.

Familiarity with social media analytics and reporting tools.



Education and Experience:

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or a related field (preferred).

At least 2-3 years of experience in social media management and video content creation.

title: Google Ads- Home Service Business
description:
Are you highly experienced in managing Google Ads and Local Service Ads for home service businesses?

We are a window cleaning, gutter cleaning, and exterior cleaning company based in the Oklahoma City metro. We are not an agency. We are a growing service business and every advertising dollar matters.

We are looking for someone sharp, disciplined, and detail oriented to manage and optimize our Google PPC and LSA accounts.

We are not looking for a set it and forget it manager.

We need someone who understands how to:

• Lower cost per booked job

• Improve lead quality by targeting better zip codes and neighborhoods

• Optimize search terms weekly

• Build and maintain strong negative keyword lists

• Allocate budget properly between PPC and LSA

• Aggressively dispute bad LSA leads

• Track performance based on real booked jobs, not vanity metrics

We do not have access to modify our website, so your focus will strictly be Google Ads and LSA optimization. Most of our conversions happen by phone, so you must be comfortable optimizing campaigns based on call data and booked job numbers that we provide.

Our goal is not volume at any cost. Our goal is profitable, high quality leads in strong neighborhoods.

This is a long term, part time position. We are looking for someone who treats ad spend like it is their own money.

Please send:

A short 3–5 minute video introducing yourself

Specific examples of home service accounts you have managed

Results you achieved in lowering cost per lead or cost per booked job

Your proposed monthly management fee

How many hours per week you believe are necessary to properly manage a local service campaign with a $1,500–$1,750 monthly ad budget

If you are a set it and forget it type of manager, this will not be a good fit.

We are looking for someone who wants a long term relationship and takes pride in disciplined optimization.

title: YT Shorts Editor (FAST TURNAROUND)
description:
We are a 1M/yr B2B SaaS company looking for an in house editor for 10-30 new ads per week. Videos will be 30 seconds to 3 minutes long. We need someone that is an expert with FAST turn around. Excuses and being lazy DOES NOT work with us. We are looking for sharp editors looking to grow into different positions including short form, long form YT and more. 



If you don't do work thoroughly, can't think for yourself, and can't deliver in a timely manner. DO NOT EVEN THINK about applying. 



Here is exactly what you will do: 



1) Receive a full script of all of the ads we wrote 

2) Receive google drive folder of every hook, body, and call to action in video format (mp4 or mov)

3) Edit all ads with fast paced, dynamic editing styles, and VERY HIGH QUALITY animations. 



You will be editing 10-30 new short-style ads per week or more. 



I need someone sharp, not lazy, and studies engagement to the tee. It should include creativity, logos, and dynamic cuts. 



Please include YOUR best work in a google drive. We will schedule a 10 minute interview and get going from there.

title: AI Video Editor Facebook Ads
description:
Hello Future Employee,



Who are we?

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating Shopify brand stores across Europe, generating consistent 6-figure monthly revenue. We specialize in emotionally-driven direct response advertising.



We are hiring an AI Video Editor to produce AI video ads for our brand. The right candidate will have a sharp eye for realism, understand what makes an AI generator feel authentic (not staged), and be eager to learn our specific creative frameworks. You will be trained directly by the founder on our proven systems.



Responsibilities:



Generate high-quality AI Videos for direct response marketing

Follow brand guidelines and creative briefs to produce realistic, AI videos

Iterate quickly based on feedback to refine concepts

Organize and manage image assets for the creative team





You are the perfect fit if you have these qualities:



Experience with AI video generation tools (VEO3, Sora 2, Kling)

Strong visual eye for what looks "real" vs. "staged"

Detail-oriented and able to follow specific creative direction

Fast learner, coachable, and responsive to feedback

Video editing skills are a significant bonus



To apply, please include:



Example(s) of AI videos you have created

Which AI tools/models you used to create them

A brief note on your experience level



What we offer:



100% remote work setup

Starting salary of $500/month with performance-based growth opportunities

Direct training and mentorship from founder

A creative, fast-paced environment with real ownership of output

Long-term growth potential as the team scales



If you are creative, coachable, and excited to master AI image generation, we'd love to hear from you. To confirm you've read the entire post, please include "COF" in your application.



Best Regards,

ASG

title: WordPress & Shopify Store Developer
description:
Arispheris is looking for a highly skilled Website Developer to join our team for a 3-month full-time project term, with potential for extension. This is a remote position, but we require a designer who can work independently, take initiative, and bring fresh, original creativity to the table—no AI-generated websites will be accepted.



If you thrive in an environment that values creative autonomy, attention to detail, and hands-on design skills, we’d love to hear from you.



Company Overview

Arispheris is a staffing firm that provides authentic and connective staffing solutions for small business owners. We take pride in our in-depth recruiting process, ensuring that every professional we bring on board has the skills and drive to succeed.



We are actively expanding our design team and are looking for a Website Developer who excels at crafting fast and SEO ready websites to support clients in reaching their target audiences to increase revenue and website traffic. If you want to be part of a team that values true creative expertise, this is the perfect opportunity for you!



Requirements & Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Web development or related field, or relevant experience.

Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in website design and coding.

Website and software application designing, building, or maintaining, without AI.

Using scripting or authoring languages, management tools, content creation tools, applications, and digital media.

Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions.

Directing or performing Website updates.

Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device types.

Editing, writing, or designing Website content, and directing tea
mbers who produce content.

Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education, study, and training. 

Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recovery.

Create daily logs of tasks completed for company and client reference.

Identifying problems uncovered by customer feedback and testing, and correcting or referring problems to appropriate personnel for correction.

Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards, is valid, is properly structured, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems.

Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirements.

Must be highly proficient in both WordPress, their respective plugins, & Shopify—you will be tested during the interview.

Strong sense of design composition.

Ability to create websites quickly and efficiently while maintaining a high standard of design quality.

Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with clients and teams.

Detail-oriented and capable of handling multiple projects at once while meeting deadlines.

Familiarity with tools like Google Workspace, Slack, and Asana is a plus.

Absolutely no AI-generated designs, portfolios, and websites will be considered.



Software & Platform Requirements:

Expertise in WordPress, Shopify and Elementor

Solid understanding of UX/UI principles

Proficiency in HTML and Python coding

Experience with affiliate marketing strategies

Proficiency with Shopify e-commerce platforms



Compensation & Benefits

Full-time remote position (3-month term, potential for extension based on performance)

Competitive compensation based on experience and skills

Bi-monthly pay via money transfer

Paid career training relevant to the role (should you be hired for longer than nine months) 

Performance-based bonuses (available for long-term staff)

Work-life balance and flexible hours



As part of our team, you'll interact closely with clients, forming strong partnerships. You'll use your excellent communication skills to understand, negotiate, and ultimately create tailored solutions that exceed expectations. Does the idea of such meaningful client engagement unnerve you? If not, then you're ready to contribute to our shared vision. Here are the next steps to move forward.



***Very Important***

How to Apply

We will be holding interviews on Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday this week for immediate hiring contingent on your skills, your interview task performance and company fit.



To Apply, Follow These Steps:

Reply with your Name and Position in the subject line. Example: "John Doe – WordPress & Shopify Store Developer"

Define a "backend developer staging area" in WordPress/ CPanel (this is part of your application process).



Submit the following in your response
:

Your resume (CV)

Portfolio links showcasing your original design work (Absolutely NO AI-generated websites. Wordpress & Shopify Shops ONLY)

List links to Wordpress & Shopify Sites you have designed.

One employer reference



Candidates that do not submit the requested items will not be considered. 



Once we receive your application, we will send you a scheduler to book your interview slot. During your interview, you will be required to demonstrate proficiency in Wordpress, Developer Backend, and Shopify Shop Setup.



If you’re ready to bring your creativity to a team that values real site developer expertise, we look forward to your application!

title: Senior Accountant (Bookkeeping and Tax)
description:
Professional with several years of US accounting and tax firm experience. Excellent English communicator and very organized and proactive. Problem solver and ability to thrive in chaos. 



Quickbooks guru and enough tax preparation knowledge to assist during tax season. Knowledge of payroll management and reporting, sales tax, and financial statement reporting with variance commentary. 



Looking for collaborative team player to take ownership in their work and delivering excellence to clients and peers. Seeking professional who can perform with minimal guidance from supervisor and get the job done.



Preference is to work Eastern Standard Time and existing workstation setup to remote in to our network.

title: SEO Specialist/Campaign Manager
description:
Must have 5+ prior years of SEO experience and campaign management. Experience managing 10+ clients, local SEO and small business Google ads campaigns. Experience managing a small team of workers (2-4 people) preferred. 





Must be able to clearly understand directions and follow written directions exactly how described. Must be very detail oriented clearly speak and understand English and follow established operating procedures. Should be comfortable with reviewing and fine tuning SEO tasks within campaigns. Oversee the work of 1-2 SEO specialists.  



Ideal candidate should have an understanding how to use the following applications/products:



- Google My Business Profile

- Google Sheets

- Wordpress& Other CMS Systems

- Wordpress Plugins

- Google Sites

- Go Daddy Hosting/Siteground and other hosting plans

- Other Google Properties





SEO Specific Experience with the following:



- Technical On-Page SEO (ability to apply/review advanced schema markup)

- Link building & link Silos (web 2.0's, google stacking, PBNs)

- Google My Business Page Optimization

- Wordpress installation & site modifications

- Understanding of HTML and how to make basic revisions

- Schema Markup (JSON-LD)

- iframe & embeding

- Google Stacking concepts

- Permalinks

- Complete on-page optimization of a website (H tags, Title Tags, meta description)

- link silo and webpage interlinking

- Managing off-page link building tasks and assignments

- Comfortable with providing video reports to clients each month





MUST have Working knowledge using the following tools

- Page Optimizer Pro

- Screaming Frog

- Google Analytics

- Asana

- SEMRush



This is a remote, virtual position. We are looking for a professional person who is looking to grow with our company over the long term. There is opportunity for further growth and development with the right candidate. Looking for candidate to manage and oversee the work of 2 SEO specialists. This is senior position and previous experience managing a team is important and will be considered.  



Must have good internet connection 30+ Mbps!

title: Real Estate Follow Up Specialist & Cold Caller
description:

title: Real Estate Cold Caller (Work From Home | Long-Term Position)
description:
We are a growing U.S.-based real estate investment company looking for a reliable and motivated Cold Calling Virtual Assistant to join our team long-term.



Your main responsibility will be calling homeowners in the United States to identify individuals who may be interested in selling their property.



We are looking for someone who is confident speaking with people, dependable, and comfortable making outbound calls daily.



This is a stable, long-term work-from-home opportunity for the right candidate.



Responsibilities:

- Make outbound calls to property owners using our dialing system

- Speak with homeowners professionally

- Identify motivated property sellers

- Collect basic property information

- Enter lead details into our CRM

- Transfer qualified leads to our acquisitions team

- Maintain consistent daily calling activity



Requirements:

- Clear and understandable English

- Neutral or easy-to-understand accent

- Previous cold calling or sales experience preferred

- Reliable high-speed internet connection

- Laptop or desktop computer

- Noise-canceling headset

- Comfortable making high-volume outbound calls



Compensation:

$4–$6 USD per hour (based on experience and performance)

Weekly pay

Performance bonus opportunities available

Long-term employment opportunity



Work Schedule:

- 40 hours per week preferred

- Must be available during U.S. calling hours



To Apply:



Please include the following:



1. Resume

2. Description of your cold calling experience

3. Computer and headset specifications

4. Short voice recording introducing yourself as if calling a homeowner

title: Remote Architect / 3D Designer – Factory Rendering & Visualization
description:
**Job Title:** Remote Architect / 3D Designer – Factory Rendering & Visualization



**Location:** Remote (Worldwide)



**Project Type:** Contract / Freelance (Potential for ongoing work)



---



### About Us



Redefine Meals is a fast-growing food company building next-generation production infrastructure to scale nationally. We are designing a modern food manufacturing facility and are looking for a talented architect or 3D designer to create high-quality visual renderings of our future factory.



This project will help visualize our production vision for investors, partners, marketing, and internal planning.



---



### Role Overview



We are seeking a skilled **Architectural 3D Designer / Visualization Artist** to transform conceptual layouts and operational requirements into realistic, presentation-ready factory renderings.



You will collaborate directly with our leadership team to design and visualize a modern, efficient, and brand-aligned production facility.



---



### Responsibilities



* Create detailed **3D architectural renderings** of a food production facility

* Translate floor plans, workflows, and equipment layouts into visual environments

* Develop:



  * Exterior building renderings

  * Interior production floor visualization

  * Equipment placement concepts

  * Lighting, materials, and branding elements

* Produce photorealistic images suitable for investor decks and marketing

* Iterate based on feedback and evolving operational needs



---



### Requirements



* Experience in **architectural visualization or industrial/factory design**

* Strong portfolio showcasing realistic 3D environments

* Proficiency in tools such as:



  * Blender, 3ds Max, Cinema 4D, or similar

  * SketchUp / Revit / AutoCAD (preferred)

  * Unreal Engine or Twinmotion (bonus)

* Ability to work remotely and communicate clearly

* Strong attention to scale, workflow, and realism



---



### Nice to Have



* Experience with manufacturing, logistics, or food production facilities

* Understanding of functional layouts and operational flow

* Animation or walkthrough capability



---



### Deliverables



* High-resolution still renderings

* Optional flythrough or animated walkthrough (bonus)

* Editable source files



---



### Engagement Details



* Remote freelance project

* Flexible timeline (initial concepts needed quickly)

* Potential for ongoing collaboration as facilities expand



---



### To Apply



Please include:



1. Portfolio or sample work (REQUIRED)

2. Software proficiency

3. Estimated timeline

4. Project or hourly rate



We are looking for someone who can help bring a large-scale vision to life visually.

title: Senior Paid Media Editor
description:
Calling All Editing Wizards!



Join our growing digital marketing agency, JL Marketing, as a Senior Paid Media Editor! We’re seeking a creative and detail-oriented editor who specializes in crafting high-impact video and still image content for paid search, social media, and TikTok campaigns. Your work will help our clients stand out and drive measurable results across today’s most dynamic platforms.





What You’ll Do:



- Edit and enhance raw video footage and still images into polished, high-performing assets for paid search, social media (including Instagram,
, and TikTok), and other digital ad placements.



- Develop compelling narratives and visual stories tailored to short-form formats and platform-specific best practices.



- Collaborate closely with our paid media, creative, and strategy teams to ensure all content aligns with campaign goals, brand guidelines, and client objectives.



- Optimize videos and images for various ad specs, aspect ratios, and audience engagement strategies

.

- Stay current on the latest trends in video editing, social media content, and paid media creative.



- Assist with editing and supporting our company branding, organic social media content and other various internal content editing & design support. 





Bonus Points If You Have:



- Proven experience editing for TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, and other short-form social platforms.

- Familiarity with paid media creative requirements and best practices for ad performance.

- Skills in motion graphics or animation (a plus, not required).

- Experience with A/B testing creative variations for paid campaigns.

- Copywriting skills to ideate unique hooks and messaging for our creatives.

- Have knowledge of health and wellness brands and their messaging.





What We Offer:



 - Remote work with a fun, US-based digital marketing agency.

 - Competitive salary and benefits, including on-time payments and potential performance bonuses.

 - Ongoing learning and development opportunities!

 - Monthly compensation of $
depending on experience



Must be able to work PST-EST hours



Ready to Apply?



Ready to start your journey with JL Marketing? We are only reviewing applications submitted through our website. To demonstrate your attention to detail, please start your answer to the final question on the application form with the word BLUE. Please fill out our application here: 
/creative-editor-application





We look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

title: Job Application VA (US Jobs) – Full-Time, Long-Term
description:
I’m hiring a full-time Job Application Specialist VA to apply to US jobs for me (mostly tech roles). This is a long-term role focused on high-volume applications, clean tracking, and daily reporting.



You will work independently, but we will follow a simple daily approval process:

 1. You send me a list of jobs you plan to apply to tomorrow

 2. I review and approve/remove any conflicts of interest

 3. The next day, you apply to the approved list and track everything



---



Pay (Weekly — USD)

 • $3.25 USD/hour (US Dollars)

 • 40 hours/week = $130 USD/week

 • Paid weekly

 • Week ends Friday, payout is Monday (3 days after)



---



Work Schedule (Philippines Time)

 • Start time: 6:00 AM PH time

 • Full-time: 40 hours/week

 • This schedule overlaps with my evenings in Los Angeles

        • Primary communication will be on WhatsApp texts if you prefer. Voice calls only needed if texts are unclear. You are welcome to ask for a call anytime something is unclear.



---



Daily Targets (KPI)

 • 40–50 job applications per day minimum

 • Must be real applications (company website / ATS forms)



LinkedIn “Easy Apply” is allowed, but it does NOT count toward the 40–50/day quota.

(You can do Easy Apply only if you have extra time for better odds at getting bonus)



---



What You Will Do



A) Job Applications (Main Task)

 • Apply to US roles like:

 • Platform Engineer, DevOps, SRE, Cloud/Infrastructure Architect, Solutions Architect (hands-on)

 • W2 roles are fine, and contract/C2C roles are preferred

 • Use the base resume I provide

 • Optional: You may lightly tailor the resume to the job (not required, but a plus)



B) Job List Approval (Required)

 • Every day, send me a list of jobs you want to apply to the next day

 • After I approve the list, you apply to those jobs the following day



C) Tracking + Daily Report (Required)

You must track every application in a spreadsheet with:

 • Company name

 • Job link

 • If applied to or not

 • Notes (requirements, keywords)



Daily report (once per day) must include:

 • Total applications submitted (quota count only)

 • Updates to the spreadsheet

 • Any questions/blockers



D) Inbox Management (Required)

 • Clean my job inbox daily

 • Move spam/promotions/unrelated
s into a separate folder/label

 • Keep only relevant recruiter/job-related
s in the main inbox

 • You will NOT reply to recruiters or schedule interviews (I handle all communication)



---



Tools / Setup

 • You will remote into my computer using TeamViewer (I will provide access)

 • I may provide tools such as a ChatGPT subscription / custom GPT (already installed) so you can ask questions about my resume/background while working

(You do not pay for this.)



---



Bonus (Very Important)

 • $400 bonus for every job or client landed that comes from the applications you submitted



---



Long-Term Growth + Pay Increases



This is a long-term role. Once we reach a stable flow of applications/interviews and the business grows, this role can expand into supporting my consulting business (client research, lead list building, admin ops, and other business support tasks).

As performance stays strong and the business grows, there’s opportunity for higher hourly pay and additional bonuses based on consistency, quality, and results.



---



Assessment / Interview (Important)

---



How to Apply



Please answer these two items:

 1. Can you start at 6:00 AM Philippine time, full-time? (Yes/No)

 2. Start your message with the word TRACKER (so I know you read the post)

3. Please put in your message any relevant work experience that you have and a couple of sentences on why you would be able to excel at this role

title: Operations Coordinator
description:
POSITION OVERVIEW

The Operations Coordinator owns the daily operational rhythm of HD Media House. Acting as the central hub between field teams, editors, customer service, and leadership, this role ensures every project is executed efficiently, communicated clearly, and delivered to brand standards.

This position requires decisive coordination, proactive problem-solving, and systems thinking. The Operations Coordinator not only manages logistics but continuously improves workflows, strengthens accountability, and safeguards the client experience as the company scales.



POSITION SUMMARY

The Operations Coordinator ensures smooth coordination across projects, people, and processes. This individual manages daily production logistics, oversees team schedules, supports quality control, and proactively resolves workflow or client issues.

This role requires high-level communication skills, operational awareness, and the ability to think ahead to prevent bottlenecks. The Operations Coordinator collaborates closely with Creative, Customer Service, and Sales departments to ensure timely, client-ready deliverables.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

Daily Responsibilities

Manage and oversee internal scheduling for Media Pros and editors





Coordinate and dispatch same-day or next-day urgent changes





Update project timelines and appointment calendars





Route client communication to appropriate tea
mbers and track resolution





Ensure client response times remain within 10–20 minutes during operating hours





Set clear next-day follow-ups when needed





Lead and manage client communications to ensure proactive updates





Oversee and adjust team schedules across departments (Field, Editing, Customer Service)





Support Quality Control workflows to uphold brand and delivery standards





Funnel important updates from field teams and clients into centralized systems





Provide consultative support on upgrades and service options







Weekly Responsibilities

Host weekly team sync meetings to review bottlenecks, timelines, and priorities





Lead weekly task check-ins and monitor internal accountability





Report on project statuses and departmental KPIs





Coordinate with cross-functional teams (Creative, Customer Service, Sales)





Analyze recurring project issues and propose system improvements





Support onboarding of new tea
mbers and freelancers





Contribute to lead generation or outreach initiatives as requested







Monthly Responsibilities

Compile and report on key performance metrics (revenue, retention, production success, workflow health)





Identify trends in client requests or operational inefficiencies





Implement system, communication, and quality improvements





Review and document SOP updates to maintain operational standards





Participate in monthly strategic planning and forecasting sessions





Support hiring, onboarding, and training initiatives





KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS (KPIs)

Client response time compliance



On-time project completion rate



Quality control pass rate



Schedule accuracy and resource allocation efficiency



Reduction in recurring workflow issues



Team accountability follow-through



Client satisfaction and retention



SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS

Strong operational and project coordination experience



Excellent written and verbal communication skills



High proficiency in CRM systems, Google Workspace, and scheduling tools



Ability to manage multiple workflows simultaneously



Experience leading cross-department collaboration



Strong organizational and time management skills



Proactive problem solver with systems-thinking mindset



Comfortable managing deadlines and high-volume production environments



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS

Hourly Rate: $X/hour



5 Paid Days Off Annually

Quarterly Sales Bonus Opportunity (up to 1.5%)





Commission eligibility on client referrals



WORK ENVIRONMENT

Fully Remote



Standard business operating hours with flexibility as production demands require

High-communication, fast-paced environment





If you are interested in this position send us an
 with subject line Operations Coordinator. And send us a video telling us why you want to work for HD Media House and why you would be a good fit. 



CULTURE & COMMITMENT

HD Media House values ownership, responsiveness, excellence in execution, and team collaboration. The Operations Coordinator is expected to lead with initiative, maintain high standards, and contribute to the continued growth and scalability of the organization.

title: Risk Associate
description:
AJG Transport is a safety focused trucking company committed to running safe, compliant, and efficient operations across the U.S.



We are looking for a Risk & Operations Associate to help monitor trucking operations, ensure compliance, and support smooth coordination between drivers and dispatch. This role is ideal for someone detail oriented, responsible, and comfortable working in a fast paced and structured logistics environment.



Role Overview

As a Risk & Operations Associate, you will monitor real time trucking operations to ensure safety, compliance, and continuity by preventing HOS violations, identifying and escalating risks early, maintaining accurate documentation, and supporting either day or night shifts based on business needs.



What You’ll Be Doing

• Monitor safety in trucking operations in real time

• Track Hours of Service (HOS) and ELD compliance

• Identify drivers nearing violations and take proactive action

• Respond to and escalate issues such as delays, a
, equipment concerns, or policy violations

• Conduct basic i
 documentation and reporting

• Log repairs and upload invoices into Loadstop

• Generate simple compliance and audit reports

• Communicate with dispatch, drivers, and leadership as needed

• Ensure clean shift handoffs and clear documentation



What We’re Looking For

• Have experience in US trucking, dispatch, fleet operations, safety, or compliance

• Understand HOS, ELD systems, and FMCSA/DOT standards (strong plus)

• Are comfortable monitoring multiple drivers and assets at once

• Stay calm and organized in a fast paced environment

• Communicate clearly via chat,
, and i
 reports

• Follow SOPs consistently

• Type at least 50 WPM

• Follows instructions consistently and executes with precision

• Team oriented, coachable, and open to feedback without ego



Schedule & Work Setup

• Full Time | 7 AM - 5 PM CST & 11 PM - 9 AM CST (San Antonio time)

• Must work U.S. business hours

• Collaborative Zoom based work environment (with camera open)

• Time tracking software used for accountability and performance support



Why Join AJG Transport?

• Stable full time opportunity

• Clear responsibilities and structured workflows

• Training and leadership support

• Growth opportunities within operations and safety

• Work directly with US trucking operations



If you’re dependable, detail oriented, and understand the importance of having a safety and monitoring team in a logistics company, recognizing that proactive risk management protects drivers, ensures compliance, and prevents costly disruptions, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Carrier Sales Representative
description:
GH Logistics is a growing freight brokerage and asset-based logistics company specializing in dry van and reefer freight. Our strength comes from reliable carrier partnerships, disciplined execution, and scalable capacity across the U.S.



As our network continues to expand, we’re looking for a Carrier Sales Representative to help us build strong, long-term relationships with carriers and support clean, on-time freight execution. If you enjoy structured outbound work, building partnerships, and working in a fast-paced logistics environment this role offers clear expectations, measurable growth, and career advancement.



Role Overview

This role combines carrier network expansion and load coverage execution.



Carrier Development (Network Growth)

You will be responsible for:

• Reach out to 20-50 carriers daily to introduce GH Logistics

• Verify carriers for insurance, authority, safety, and compliance

• Complete carrier onboarding and setup documentation

• Educate carriers on our lanes and freight opportunities

• Position carriers for repeat, long-term business, not one time loads

• Create at least 1 group chat per onboarded carrier daily

• Send mass
s to carrier lists to support load coverage

• Maintain organized activity tracking and communication logs



Carrier Sales (Coverage & Execution)

• Cover shipments using GH approved carriers

• Source capacity through calls, load boards, and existing contacts

• Book at least 1 load through approved carriers

• Secure at least 1 dedicated lane per week through repeat carrier usage

• Manage carrier communication through structured group chats

• Follow up to create recurring lane opportunities

• Coordinate with internal teams to ensure smooth execution

• Update and maintain tracking spreadsheets daily with accurate activity data



What Success Looks Like

• Consistent 20-50 calls daily

• At least 5 quality carriers onboarded and activated regularly

• Carriers are fully set up, connected, and positioned for repeat freight

• Loads covered on time with clean communication

• Communication is centralized, documented, and reliable

• Carriers move from onboarding to activation to recurring usage



Who We’re Looking For

• Have experience in Carrier Sales, Dispatch, Freight Brokerage, or Trucking Operations

• Comfortable making 20 - 50 outbound calls per day

• Highly organized, tech savvy, and able to manage multiple spreadsheets and group chats

• Type at least 50 WPM

• Thrives in a fast paced and high urgency freight environment

• Communicate professionally via phone, chat, and

• Performance driven and KPI oriented

• Capable of leading structured carrier conversations and daily meetings

• Follows instructions consistently and executes with precision

• Team oriented, coachable, and open to feedback without ego



Schedule & Work Setup

• Full Time | Monday Friday

• 7:00 AM – 5:00 PM CST (San Antonio time)

• Must work U.S. business hours

• Collaborative Zoom based work environment (with camera open and unmuted audio)

• Time tracking software used for accountability and performance support



Compensation & Growth

• Starting Base: $8/hour (Up to $10/hour inclusive of performance incentives)

• Performance Incentives: Based on carrier onboarding, activation, and load execution

• Career Path: Carrier Development to Senior Carrier Rep to Account Manager. We promote based on performance and consistency.



Why Join GH Logistics?

• Structured systems and clear expectations

• Hands on leadership and direct feedback

• Defined KPIs and measurable growth

• Opportunity to grow within a scaling freight brokerage

• Performance based advancement



If you’re looking for a role where effort is recognized and growth is tied to output, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Track and Trace Assistant
description:

Our operation is built on real time visibility, disciplined execution, and clear communication. We take pride in keeping freight organized, on track, and moving cleanly from pickup to delivery. If you’re someone who enjoys staying engaged, solving live challenges, and being part of a fast moving operations team, you’ll feel right at home here.

Who We’re Looking For

Why Join GH Logistics?

• Defined KPIs and measurable growth

• Performance based advancement



Schedule & Work Setup

This role is built for someone who genuinely enjoys following freight in motion, monitoring shipments, confirming updates, and making sure deliveries stay on track. If you like staying proactive, spotting risks before they become problems, and keeping operations running smoothly behind the scenes, you’ll fit right in.
