title: SparkBox
description:
ABOUT US



SparkBox is a relationship ecosystem designed to help couples maintain curiosity, connection, and intimacy in their relationship.



WE OFFER

- SparkBites – Free daily SMS prompts that spark intentional connection

- SparkBox – A curated monthly relationship experience

- Future expansions into coaching and retreats



We are in early-stage growth and building foundational systems now. This is a rare opportunity to become Employee #1 and grow with a mission-driven brand from the ground up.



THE ROLE



We are hiring a highly capable, technically savvy E-Commerce & Marketing Assistant to help build and manage the technical foundation of our business.



This role is ideal for someone who:

- Loves systems and organization

- Is strong in Shopify

- Understands SMS marketing platforms (Postscript preferred)

- Is proactive, independent, and detail-oriented

- Wants long-term growth with a brand



You will work directly with the founders and help execute across e-commerce, automation, and marketing operations.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

1?? Shopify Site Development & Optimization

- Assist with Shopify theme setup and customization

- Build and optimize product pages

- Create landing pages for campaigns

- Implement subscription functionality

- Improve UX and conversion rate

- Manage apps and integrations

- Upload products, collections, and assets



2?? SMS Marketing (Postscript)

- Build and manage SMS flows

- Set up automation sequences

- Manage keyword opt-ins

- Segment audiences

- Monitor performance metrics

- Test and optimize campaigns

- Ensure compliance with SMS regulations



3?? Technical Marketing Support

- Connect Shopify with Postscript, Klaviyo, and other tools

- Set up tracking pixels and analytics

- Build simple landing pages

- Assist with
 automation setup

- Help manage contact lists

- QA testing before launches



4?? Operations & Systems

- Document processes

- Build SOPs

- Help organize dashboards

- Assist with reporting and metrics

- Research tools and recommend improvements

- Required Skills

- Strong Shopify experience (theme editing preferred)

- Experience with SMS platforms (Postscript preferred)

- Understanding of subscription models

- Familiarity with marketing automation

- Comfortable using apps and integrations

- Strong English communication (written and verbal)

- Detail-oriented

- Reliable internet connection

- Self-starter mindset



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED, BUT HELPFUL)



- Klaviyo experience

- Canva design skills

- Basic HTML/CSS

- Experience with subscription box businesses

- Knowledge of SMS compliance regulations (TCPA, etc.)

- Experience working directly with founders

- What Success Looks Like (First 90 Days)

- Shopify site fully functional and optimized

- SMS flows built and tested

- Clean backend systems

- SOPs documented

- Campaign calendar organized

- Minimal supervision required

- Why Join SparkBox?

- Early-stage opportunity

- Long-term growth potential

- Direct access to founder

- Creative, mission-driven brand

- Opportunity to expand into leadership as we scale

- Work Structure



Full-time preferred (40 hrs/week)

Must overlap at least 4 hours with U.S. Mountain Time

Weekly planning meetings

Daily progress updates



HOW TO APPLY



Please include:

- A short paragraph explaining why you are a strong fit

- Examples of Shopify stores you’ve worked on

- Experience with SMS marketing platforms

- A Loom video (2–3 minutes) introducing yourself

- Your expected hourly/monthly salary

- Your favorite Shopify app and why

- Include the word SPARK in the first line of your application so we know you read this fully.

title: Sales & Production Coordinator – Client & Vendor Relations Expert
description:
Sales & Production Coordinator – Client & Vendor Relations Expert



Company: STX Promo | 
 



Location: Remote (Philippines-based) 



Work Hours: Full-Time, U.S. Day Shift (Philippine Overnight) + Light weekend inbox rotation 

Pay Range: $1,100–$1,500/month (Includes premium pay for U.S. hours / Night Shift. Starting rate depends on experience and operational expertise).





???? About STX Promo & Our Growth:



STX Promo helps businesses and organizations Step Up Their Setup with eye-catching custom canopies, table covers, flags, banners, and more. We work with small businesses, schools, and nonprofits across the U.S. to elevate their brand presence at events and trade shows.



We are growing incredibly fast. Over the last 10 months alone, we’ve added 4 people to our core team along with several specialized gig workers. As we gear up for our busiest season yet, our current Sales and Production Coordinator is handling a massive volume of orders. We are actively hiring a second full-time coordinator to jump into the trenches, split the workload, and help us maintain our pro-level communication and zero-hassle client experience.





???? About the Role: Your Impact:



We are looking for a heavy hitter. We need a highly organized, proactive Sales & Production Coordinator who specializes in Client and Vendor Relations and Process Optimization.



In this role, you are the crucial bridge between our U.S. clients, our internal design team, and our manufacturing suppliers. Because we are growing so quickly, our backend operations need to evolve. We are looking for someone who brings strong operational insights to the table—someone who can look at how we currently do things, identify bottlenecks, and help us build more efficient, error-proof workflows.





Key Responsibilities:



Workflow Optimization: Actively analyze and improve our backend processes. Bring fresh ideas to the table on how to best utilize ClickUp, Shopify, and Gmail to maximize our team's efficiency and minimize costly mistakes.



Client Relations: Manage daily incoming sales and customer service
s (via Gmail) and handle live chat inquiries, utilizing AI tools (ChatGPT/Gemini) to draft efficient, professional responses.



Vendor Management: Place precise orders through various supplier portals. Proactively follow up on order statuses, track estimated delivery times, and troubleshoot any delays directly with vendors.



Production Coordination: Collaborate heavily with our Graphic Design team. You will confirm print graphics with clients, ensure mockups align with expectations, and prepare final files for supplier handoff.



Workflow Tracking: Organize and communicate project priorities using ClickUp to track progress and strict deadlines. Maintain organized client files within Google Drive.



Team Sync: Communicate efficiently with the internal team on a daily basis via WhatsApp.



Schedule & Light Weekend Rotation: Work a consistent Monday–Friday U.S. daytime schedule. You won't have to work every weekend. You will split a light weekend inbox rotation with our current coordinator (e.g., alternating weekends or splitting Saturday/Sunday). This is just a quick check-in to ensure clients aren't left hanging. Many clients shop around on weekends—by replying quickly while our competitors wait until Monday, we win the deal!





? You're a Great Fit If You Have:



Top-Tier English & US Culture Match: Proven experience working directly with a U.S.-based company. You must possess a strong understanding of American business communication, tone, and customer expectations. (This is a massive differentiator for us—your English must be impeccable).



Operational Mindset: You aren't just an order-taker; you are a problem solver who naturally looks for ways to make systems run smoother and faster.



Vendor/Client Experience: A solid background in managing supplier relationships and keeping clients happy, especially when dealing with physical products and shipping deadlines.



Extreme Attention to Detail: One wrong measurement or file upload can ruin a print job. You must be hyper-vigilant when approving graphics and placing orders.



Grace Under Pressure: You thrive in a fast-paced environment, can juggle multiple priorities at once, and keep your cool during the "busy season."



Reliability: A stable internet connection and a concrete backup plan for power or internet outages.





? Bonus Points If You Also Have:



Prior experience or understanding of the promotional products industry, large-format printing, or design files (e.g., bleed, CMYK, vectors).



Hands-on experience managing orders within Shopify.





???? How to Apply (Please Read Carefully):



Attention to detail starts here. To ensure your application stands out, please submit the following:

Your updated Resume/CV.



A short written note answering these three questions:



What specific experience do you have managing US-based clients and interacting with third-party vendors/suppliers?



Have you ever worked with print or design files before? If so, please briefly describe your experience.



Why do you believe you would truly thrive in this fast-paced, high-volume role, and how do you approach making workflows more efficient?



(Note: If your application is shortlisted, Step 2 of our interview process will be to submit a quick 2-minute video or voice intro so we can get to know you better!)



Applications missing any of the requirements above will be automatically filtered out and will not be reviewed. We look forward to reviewing your application and finding the next crucial member of our growing team!

title: Patient Care Coordinator
description:
We are an innovative health tech company specializing in the development of a cutting-edge nutrition app. Our app leverages personalized data, including physical conditions, genetic components, and more to create tailored diets, nutritional plans, and recipes. Designed to support patients at the highest level of care, our platform empowers users to achieve optimal health outcomes through science-backed personalization.



We’re seeking a proactive and motivated Patient Care Coordinator to join our team urgently. In this key position, you’ll play a vital role in ensuring the success of our users and patients by coordinating their journey through our app. If you’re someone who takes initiative, thrives in a fast-paced environment, and is passionate about health and technology, this is your opportunity to make a real impact.



Key Responsibilities:



-Manage the onboarding process for new users and patients, guiding them through setup and initial use of the app.

-Monitor and document user experiences, including any challenges, troubleshooting issues, and feedback.

-Relay critical insights and data to the leadership and development team to drive continuous app improvements and enhancements.

-Coordinate communication between users, patients, and internal stakeholders to ensure smooth operations and high satisfaction.

-Proactively identify opportunities to optimize user success and contribute ideas for app features based on real-world interactions.



Qualifications and Skills:



-Excellent command of English, both written and verbal – clear communication is essential.

-Strong organizational skills with a keen eye for detail and the ability to keep accurate notes and records.

-Self-motivated and initiative-driven; we need someone who isn’t afraid to roll up their sleeves and get things done.

-Experience in customer service, patient coordination, or a similar role in health/tech is a plus, but enthusiasm and a quick learning curve are key.

-Familiarity with nutrition, wellness apps, or digital health tools is advantageous but not required.

-Ability to work independently while being a collaborative team player.



How to Apply:

Change the Subject Line to: "Patient Care Coordinator – [Your Name] "

Send your resume and any relevant portfolio samples to:

d a t . v a 1 1 4 8 at g`m`a`i`l . c o m (remove spaces)



We look forward to reviewing your application and exploring how your skills can contribute to our team!



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Creative Graphic & Brand Designer – Fast-Growing US Team (Full-Time Hours Available!)
description:
Creative Graphic & Brand Designer – Fast-Growing US Team (Full-Time Hours Available!)



Company: STX Promo | 
 



Location: Remote (Philippines-based) Work Hours: U.S. Day Shift (Flexible, see below!) 



Pay: $6.00/hour (With the ability to work 40+ hours a week)





???? About STX Promo & Our Explosive Growth:



STX Promo helps businesses and organizations Step Up Their Setup with eye-catching custom canopies, table covers, flags, banners, tradeshow setups and more.



We are growing at a massive pace. To give you an idea: we hired a new graphic designer just 3 weeks ago, and our order volume is so high that we already need to hire another one! Our last two design hires started at 4 hours a day, and within two weeks, they were working 6–8+ hours a day.



Bottom line: If you are hungry for work and want consistent, reliable hours, we have as much work as you can handle.





???? About the Role: Your Impact:



We need a visionary Graphic Designer who is highly creative, technically precise, and savvy with the latest AI design tools.

At STX Promo, we don’t just print logos; we help brands stand out at their biggest events. We need a designer with a "good eye" for premium aesthetics who can take a client's rough idea and turn it into a high-impact display.





Key Responsibilities:



Creative Layouts: Develop eye-catching, professional layouts for canopies, banners, flags, table covers, and apparel.



Ad Creative: Generate high-converting static image ads for Meta 
/Instagram) and Google.



Vector Excellence: Recreate logos into clean, high-quality vector files. (Note: We use Vector AI tools to speed this up, but you must have the manual Adobe Illustrator skills to clean up and perfect the final output).



AI Integration: Use tools like Nano Banana, Midjourney, etc., to generate and edit high-quality visual assets. You should be comfortable with prompt engineering.



Print Readiness: Ensure all files are technically perfect and formatted correctly for large-format printing.



Team Sync: Collaborate daily with our Sales and Production Coordinators via ClickUp,
, and WhatsApp.





? You're a Great Fit If You Have:



A Creative Eye: You understand layout, typography, and color; you know how to make a design look "expensive" and professional.



Software Mastery: Expert-level proficiency in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.



Vector Skills: Ability to manually recreate almost any logo from a low-quality image into a crisp vector when AI tools fall short.



AI Savvy: Experience using AI design tools and the ability to write effective prompts.



Fluent English: Excellent communication skills to coordinate with our US-based team.





???? How to Apply (Please Read Carefully):



To show us you’re the right fit, please submit the following. Applications missing a portfolio will be immediately deleted.



Your Portfolio: You MUST include examples of:



Your best creative layouts/marketing designs.



Static image ads (Social Media/Google).



Before & After examples of your vector conversions.



A short written note answering these two questions:



Briefly describe your experience preparing files for large-format printing or apparel.



Are you looking to eventually scale up to 6–8+ hours a day, and are you comfortable working U.S. Daytime hours?



(Note: If your portfolio blows us away, Step 2 of our interview process will be to submit a quick 2-minute video or voice intro so we can get to know you better!)



We look forward to reviewing your portfolio and finding the next creative powerhouse for our team!

title: Sales Internship (SDR/Cold Caller/Outbound)
description:
Company: Core Mind Technology Inc

Employment Type: Internship

Work Setup: Remote

Schedule: 9/10pm - 6/7am PST (8am - 5pm Central Time USA) {Daylight Savings Shifts the schedule 2 times per year}



About the Role

Core Mind Technology is hiring for a Sales Development Internship (SDI) to support outbound sales efforts by generating and qualifying opportunities for our Sales Representatives/Closers. This role is focused on cold outreach, appointment setting, and early-stage qualification through phone,
, and LinkedIn engagement.

The SDI plays a critical role at the top of the funnel—creating opportunities, booking qualified meetings, and ensuring a steady flow of prospects into the sales pipeline. 



This internship will last between 16 and 26 weeks. The graduation of the internship is solely based on the intern's performance and ability to complete tasks in the amount of time allocated. There is a fast tract graduation as well if the intern generates a specific amount of revenue for the company as well



Key Responsibilities

- Outbound Prospecting & Appointment Setting

- Conduct outbound calling to targeted leads

- Book qualified discovery or sales calls for Sales Representatives/Closers

- Set up an onboarding call with an interested prospect while collecting the deposit

- Engage prospects through outbound
 and LinkedIn messaging

- Respond to replies from outbound campaigns and manage follow-up conversations



Lead Qualification & Handoff

- Qualify prospects based on basic fit, interest, and readiness

- Clearly document notes, context, and next steps before passing leads to the closer

- Ensure smooth handoff of qualified opportunities to the Sales Representative



Campaign & Outreach Support

- Act as the primary point person for LinkedIn and
 reply management

- Ensure outbound campaigns are running correctly and as intended (high-level monitoring)

- Provide feedback on messaging effectiveness and lead quality



Collaboration & Process

- Coordinate closely with Sales Representatives / Closers on active opportunities

- Align daily outreach efforts with sales goals and pipeline needs

- Follow established outbound and qualification processes consistently



What We’re Looking For

- Strong desire to succeed in outbound sales, cold calling, or appointment setting

- Comfortable with outbound volume calling and direct prospect conversations

- Strong communication and rapport-building skills

- Organized with follow-ups, notes, and lead handoffs

- Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote environment



Nice to Have

- Experience selling or prospecting for high ticket products or service/solutions based businesses (no physical product)

- Familiarity with CRMs, dialers, and outreach tools

- Experience with LinkedIn outreach and
 campaign tools



Compensation & Incentives

- Base Pay: $200 monthly salary (paid for completing required daily, weekly and monthly SDI duties and outreach activities) {interns who fail to complete 3 weeks of tasks and requirements will not qualify for base pay}

- Paid Time off for all 18 Philippines Holidays (If all SDI activities are completed or on track)

- Unlimited Paid Time Off (If all SDI activities are on track, completed or able to be reassigned) {Unless Abused}



Bonus Opportunities:

- Performance-based bonuses may be offered based on appointments booked, show rate, or revenue generated

- Training & Growth:

- Sales training, scripts, and ongoing support provided



Graduation Incentives (Assuming transition to a full time role):

- Clear growth path into Inbound Sales Representative/Closer roles after graduation (Higher Compensation)

- Company Funded Healthcare Plan

- Company Funded Macbook Air/Pro

- Company Funded Battery Back Up System (To prevent/minimize interruptions during power outages) 

- Company Funded Internet Service 



How to Apply

Please submit:

- Your resume or LinkedIn profile

- A short introduction (2–5 sentences) outlining your outbound or SDI experience

- Optional: a short voice note or video introduction

title: Sales Representative (Closer / Sales Associate – Overflow Sales)
description:
Company: Core Mind Technology

Supported Brands: Jennings Marketing Solutions, with potential support for other sister companies

Employment Type: Full-time

Work Setup: Remote

Schedule: US hours



About the Role

Core Mind Technology is hiring a Sales Representative (Closer / Sales Associate) to support inbound and outbound sales efforts across our marketing agency and related brands. This role focuses on handling qualified sales conversations, running discovery and closing calls, and moving opportunities through the pipeline with strong follow-through and documentation.

This position is ideal for a confident communicator who is comfortable leading sales conversations, qualifying prospects, and closing deals while working closely with a distributed team.



Key Responsibilities

Sales & Client Acquisition

- Handle inbound sales calls and follow up with warm and qualified leads

- Conduct outbound prospecting when needed via calls,
, and social follow-ups

- Schedule, confirm, and run discovery and sales calls

- Qualify prospects based on needs, budget, timeline, and decision-makers

- Clearly explain service offerings and value propositions

- Address objections and guide prospects toward close



Pipeline & Process Management

- Maintain accurate records of calls, notes, and outcomes in the CRM

- Ensure timely follow-ups and smooth handoff to onboarding or fulfillment teams

- Coordinate with internal tea
mbers to ensure proposals are created and delivered

- Follow the established sales process consistently



Collaboration & Communication

- Attend required sales meetings and scheduled sales calls

- Coordinate with tea
mbers on active deals and next steps

- Work with the retention and renewals workflow team to support long-term client success

- Ask for support or guidance from leadership as needed



Performance Expectations based off 20 call per week

Weeks 1 and 2:

- Learn the offer assigned and perfect your sales flow

- Target at least 60% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target 2 total closed deals in your first 2 weeks

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



Weeks 3 and 4:

- Target at least 70% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target at least 2 closed deals per week (4 total)

- Learn a new offer after 20% close ratio is maintained for 2 weeks

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



Weeks 5 through 8:

- Target 80% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target 3 - 5 closed deals per week

- Learn a new offer after 20% close ratio is maintained for 2 weeks on all offers trained on

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



Weeks 9 through 12:

- Target 80% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target 3 - 5 total closed deals

- Learn a new offer after 20% close ratio is maintained for 2 weeks on all offers trained on

- Work with leadership to funnel the offers with higher close ratio to applicable tea
mbers.

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



What We’re Looking For

- Experience in hight ticket sales, closing, appointment setting, or client acquisition

- Strong phone and zoom presence and confidence leading sales conversations

- Organized, reliable, and consistent with follow-ups

- Ability to quickly learn offers and communicate value clearly

- Comfortable suggested improvements to leadership to improve processes

- Self-driven and comfortable working remotely



Nice to Have

- Experience selling marketing services, AI systems, consulting services, and Software

- Familiarity with Close CRM, Slack, Notion, and Asana

- Experience with Zoom, Google Meet, calendars, and basic reporting



Compensation & Incentives

- Base Pay: Up to $400 monthly salary (paid for completing required daily, weekly and monthly SR duties and follow up activities) {SRs who fail to complete 3 weeks of tasks and requirements will not qualify for base pay}

- Paid Time off for all 18 Philippines Holidays (If all SDI activities are completed or on track)

- Unlimited Paid Time Off (If all SDI activities are on track, completed or able to be reassigned) {Unless Abused}



Commissions Offerings

- 10% on first month revenue closed and 3% on first months two through six of revenue collected (if client is retained)



Performance Bonus Opportunities:

- Bonuses based on retention of closed sales

- Bonuses based off number of close sales per month



Benefits after 90 days with the company:

- Company Funded Healthcare Plan

- Company Funded Macbook Air/Pro

- Company Funded Battery Back Up System (To prevent/minimize interruptions during power outages)

- Company Funded Internet Service

- Profit Share Pool Qualification



How to Apply

Please submit:

- Your resume or LinkedIn profile

- A short introduction (2–5 sentences) highlighting your sales experience

- Optional: a short voice note or video introduction

title: Graphic Designer
description:
We are seeking a talented and reliable Part-Time Graphic Designer to create engaging Instagram carousel posts each month. You will work directly with our existing brand format (text style, font, colours) and guidelines to produce high-quality, on-brand content that educates and motivates our audience of shift workers and wide fitness enthusiasts



Key Responsibilities

• Design 10–15 Instagram carousel posts per month in line with our brand templates and guidelines

• Produce visually compelling, clear, and on-brand graphics that resonate with a fitness and shift worker audience

• Manage your workload independently, delivering files on time and to the agreed brief

• Communicate proactively with the team regarding timelines, revisions, or any queries

• Incorporate feedback efficiently and maintain consistency across all content

 

Requirements

• Proven experience using Canva or similar graphic design software (e.g. Adobe Express, Figma)

• A supportive, communicative team environment

How to Apply

title: Elite Appointment Setter for Fast-Growing NYC Med Spa, Full Time, Long Term
description:
ABOUT US



ZZ Med Spa is a fast growing medical spa company based in Manhattan, New York. We operate multiple Day Spa and Med Spa locations and currently employ over 80 tea
mbers across our organization.



We are expanding our Appointment Setting team and are looking for experienced, confident professionals who are serious about long term work and performance.



ROLE OVERVIEW



As an Appointment Setter, you will be responsible for contacting leads, booking appointments, and maintaining accurate CRM records. This role requires urgency, strong communication skills, and the ability to confidently guide prospects toward scheduling.



This is not an entry level role. We are looking for individuals with real outbound experience who understand follow up discipline and conversion.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



• Conduct high volume outbound calls and SMS outreach to potential customers

• Contact new leads immediately and follow up consistently

• Schedule qualified prospects into our calendars

• Maintain accurate and detailed CRM records

• Handle objections professionally and clearly explain service benefits

• Track daily metrics including call volume, conversion rates, and appointments set



REQUIREMENTS



• Minimum 3 years of experience in appointment setting or outbound sales

• Excellent spoken and written English with clear pronunciation and confident delivery

• Strong persuasion and objection handling skills

• Experience using CRM systems and Microsoft Office

• Organized, disciplined, and goal oriented

• Reliable high speed internet and a professional work environment

• Available full time during New York business hours



WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR



We are seeking candidates who are confident on the phone, proactive in follow up, and comfortable working in a performance driven environment. You should be resilient, coachable, and motivated by results.



Qualified candidates will be contacted for the next step in our screening process.



We are planning to onboard quickly.





APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS



To be considered, please include the following:

1. The total number of years you have in appointment setting or outbound sales

2. A short voice recording introducing yourself and summarizing your relevant experience

3. Your updated resume

4. Write “NYC” in the subject line of your application so we know you read the full job description.



Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be reviewed.

title: Social Media Growth & Engagement Specialist
description:
The Mission

Apex-Emerald-AI is an automation-first agency. We have the content and the tech; now we need the human engine to spark the conversations. We aren't looking for a "VA" to do data entry—we are looking for a Growth Scout to find the right rooms, add value, and pull high-intent leads into our automated ecosystem.



There is NO cold calling required. Your job is "Social Warming." You find the leads; our automated systems handle the calls.



Your Key Responsibilities:

Strategic Infiltration: Join and monitor specific industry groups (UK & UAE focus) on LinkedIn and
 as directed.



Authority Building: Engage with industry leaders and prospects by commenting and providing genuine value (no spam).



Growth Tracking: Proactively grow our follower base across LI, Instagram, FB, X, and TikTok.



The "Trigger" Hand-off: Identify high-intent engagement. The moment a prospect asks a "How-to" or "Discovery" question, you capture their details and flag them for the Founder.



Daily Reporting: Provide a concise EOD (End of Day) report on follower growth and "Hot Leads" generated.



Requirements:



An Expert in all Social Media channels



UK & UAE Market Fluency: You must understand the cultural nuances of doing business in London and Dubai.



High-Level English: Your writing must be professional, sharp, and "human"—not robotic or templated.



Social Native: You know how to navigate LinkedIn, X, and TikTok algorithms to get eyes on content.



Initiative: You don't wait for a script; you spot an opportunity and engage.



Compensation & Growth:

Base Pay: Competitive part-time hourly/monthly rate (to be discussed).



The  Bonus: You get a direct financial bonus for:



Every Qualified Conversation handed off to the Founder.



Every Closed Deal that originated from your outreach/infiltration efforts.



Career Path: This is a part-time role with the immediate potential to grow into a full-time as role as Apex-Emerald-AI scales.



How to Apply (Strict Requirements):



This is NOT a role for a first-time VA. To be considered,
 your CV to: 
 with the following:



Proof of Experience: Provide a written referral or case study for 3 past employers or projects where you successfully grew a social presence or generated B2B leads.



The Comparison: Briefly explain the main difference in "tone" you would use when messaging a CEO in London vs. a Business Owner in Dubai.



The Infiltration: Identify two specific LinkedIn groups (one UK, one UAE) that would be high-value for an AI Automation agency to find clients.



The Bridge: A prospect in a group asks: "I have too many leads and I can't keep up with the follow-up. Any advice?" Write the 2-sentence comment you would post to get their attention without sounding like a salesman.

title: Lead Generation & Social Media Growth Specialist
description:
The Mission

We are looking for a proactive, growth-minded Social Media & Lead Generation Specialist to aggressively expand our presence within the Home Services sector (Plumbing, Electrical, HVAC, Construction, etc.) across the UK, Ireland, and the UAE.



You are not just a "poster"; you are a "hunter." Your goal is to find our Ideal Customer Profile (ICP), engage with them authentically, and bridge the gap between social media interest and a booked meeting for our team.



Key Responsibilities

Targeted Growth: Execute daily follow/request strategies across LinkedIn, Instagram, FB, X, and TikTok.



Community Mining: Join and engage in specific trade groups (e.g., Plumbing & Heating, Heat Pumps, Attic Conversions) while strictly obeying group rules.



B2B Lead Sourcing: Monitor Indeed job alerts for "Receptionists" or "Inbound Sales" to identify scaling companies in our target sectors.



Content & Engagement: Use our provided scheduling tool to maintain a consistent presence and monitor ManyChat for all automated responses (likes, follows, comments).



Precision Outreach: Use approved templates to DM relevant businesses, adapting the tone to be professional yet "local" to the UK/Ireland/UAE markets.



The Clean Handoff: Escalate any warm leads or direct inquiries immediately via WhatsApp to Dave and Dylan with full lead details.



Daily Reporting: Complete a daily sign-off sheet tracking follower growth (start vs. end of day) and total engagement metrics per channel.



Mandatory Requirements

Verifiable References: You must provide written references including a LinkedIn profile or company
 for your previous employer.



Technical Setup: Must have a stable internet connection (20Mbps+) and a backup power solution.



Account Safety: Experience using VPNs or Anti-detect browsers (AdsPower/Dolphin) to manage UK/Ireland accounts safely from overseas.



Tone of Voice: Ability to communicate in a concise, "Western Business" style (no overly formal "Dear Sir/Ma'am" templates).



Growth Mindset: We are looking for someone who pursues the ICP aggressively and doesn't just "wait for instructions."



Working Hours & Trial

Trial: 1-week Paid Trial to assess quality of leads and communication.



Hours: Starting at 3–5 hours per day, scaling up to full-time as the workload and results increase.



Timezone: Must be available to overlap with UK/Ireland/UAE business hours.

title: Construction Project Manager Assistant
description:
Stone Horizon is a growing construction company based in Victoria, Australia, specialising in the development of rooming houses. We are currently looking for a highly organised and proactive Construction Project Manager Assistant (Remote – Philippines) to support our Project Management team in the coordination and administration of multiple residential construction projects.



This role is ideal for someone detail-oriented, reliable, and comfortable working in a fast-paced construction environment, with strong administrative and coordination skills. You will play a key role in ensuring smooth project execution by assisting with documentation, supplier coordination, utilities, and site-related administrative tasks.



Key Responsibilities (Overview):





Project Coordination & Administration: Supporting the Construction Project Manager with overall project documentation, records management, and administrative tasks across multiple construction projects.



Supplier & Trade Liaison: Communicating with suppliers, consultants, and trades, coordinating quotes, documentation, specifications, and deliveries.



Compliance & Utilities Management: Assisting with permits, council and utilities paperwork, notices, and general compliance-related processes.



Site & Logistics Support: Coordinating site services, early-stage setup, hires, and general operational logistics to ensure smooth project progression.



Procurement & Financial Support: Raising purchase orders, assisting with invoices per stage, and supporting procurement and cost coordination.



What We Are Looking For:



Previous experience assisting with construction administration, project coordination, or a similar role (preferred)



Excellent organisational and time management skills



Strong written and verbal English communication



High attention to detail and ability to follow processes



Ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines



Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, and
 communication



Experience working remotely with international teams is a plus



About Stone Horizon:

At Stone Horizon, we specialise in the construction and management of rooming houses across Victoria, Australia. We are a dynamic and growing organisation focused on efficiency, innovation, and high-quality project delivery. By joining our team, you will work closely with experienced project managers and gain exposure to real construction projects in the Australian market.



This is a long-term remote position with opportunities for growth within the company as we continue to expand our operations.

title: Instagram Lead Generation & Conversion Assistant - Fitness
description:
ON-TARGET EARNINGS: £1,000–£1,200/month (uncapped)

Base: £400/month + £40 per showed assessment



WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING



You will manage our Instagram DM pipeline end-to-end: responding to inbound messages, following up with leads who've gone quiet, sending outbound messages to engaged followers, and booking qualified prospects directly into our £99 injury assessment.



This is scripted, structured DM work. High volume, low complexity. You're booking £99 assessments, not closing £5k deals on the phone. There is clear upside from volume — the more you book, the more you earn.



You will use our established scripts and AI-assisted drafting tools to compose messages, but you are responsible for reviewing all AI-drafted messages before sending to ensure they sound human, personal, and natural.





ABOUT US



Strength Physiotherapy is an online rehabilitation coaching business helping serious lifters and athletes recover from chronic injuries and return to pain-free training. We work with clients aged 34–43 who train 4–6 times per week and have been let down by traditional physiotherapy.



Our clients don't need another diagnosis — they need a plan. We use data-driven assessments and structured coaching programmes to reverse-engineer a path back to full performance.





WORKING HOURS



36 hours per week — 6 hours per day, 6 days per week.



Three 2-hour blocks per day, aligned to UK peak engagement hours:



- Morning: 8:00–10:00 AM UK

- Afternoon: 12:00–2:00 PM UK

- Evening: 6:00–8:00 PM UK



You must be online and responsive during these blocks. Downtime between blocks is yours.





KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Daily DM Management

- Respond to all inbound Instagram DMs (story replies, lead magnet requests, post comments, direct questions)

- Send 150–200 meaningful D
ssages per day (not copy-paste spam)

- Re-engage leads who have gone quiet using our follow-up sequences

- Message people who comment on posts with relevant questions or engagement

- Manage all conversations through Meta Business Suite



Monthly Reactivation

- Run monthly reactivation messages to old warm leads who previously showed interest but didn't book



Lead Conversion

- Move conversations through our DM script from first message to assessment booking

- Qualify prospects via DM: understand training background, injury history, goals, urgency, and fit

- Send relevant proof assets (testimonial videos, client screenshots, pre-recorded Looms) at the right points in the conversation

- Make direct offers for our £99 assessment when leads are qualified

- Send the assessment booking link and support leads through the sign-up process



Post-Booking Support

- Send confirmation messages to people who book an assessment

- Answer questions about downloading the app, setting up their account, and booking their onboarding call

- Escalate complex issues to the team via WhatsApp



Tracking and Reporting

- Submit a daily report at the end of each shift covering: new messages sent, follow-ups sent, responses received, ongoing conversations, inbound DMs handled, warm leads, proof messages sent, offers made, assessments booked, shows, hours worked





TOOLS YOU WILL USE



- Meta Business Suite (all DM conversations)

- Claude AI Project (draft message assistance — you review and humanise all outputs)

- DM Tracker (daily stats logging and lead tracking)

- Testimonials Folder (proof assets organised by client and injury type)

- WhatsApp (team communication and escalation)





COMPENSATION AND TARGETS



Base pay: £400 per month

Performance pay: £40 per assessment that shows up (booked by you)

Cap: None — the more you book, the more you earn



On-target earnings:

- 16 shows/month = £1,040

- 20 shows/month = £1,200

- 25+ shows/month = £1,400+



Payment is made monthly via Wise bank transfer.



2-Week Paid Trial:

- Base pay: £200 for the 2-week period

- Performance pay: £40 per showed assessment (same as ongoing)

- Success bar: 6+ showed assessments in 2 weeks

- Hit targets = move to full £400/month base + £40/show ongoing agreement

- Miss targets = trial ends, either party can walk away immediately



KPI Ramp:



Trial (Weeks 1–2):

- Learn scripts, tools, and brand voice

- Send 150+ messages/day by end of week 1

- Book 6+ showed assessments across the 2 weeks

- Attend daily training calls with the founder



Month 1:

- 150–200 messages/day consistently

- 12–17 assessments booked per month

- All daily reports submitted accurately

- Operating independently with minimal support



Month 2+:

- 17–20 assessments booked per month

- Full ownership of the DM pipeline

- Stretch target: 20+ showed assessments per month





WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR



Required:

- Proven experience as a DM setter, appointment setter, or chat-based sales rep — ideally in online fitness, coaching, agencies, or similar online service businesses

- Excellent written English with a natural, conversational tone

- Comfortable managing dozens of conversations at once without dropping balls

- Strong attention to detail and ability to follow scripts AND adapt to real conversations

- Consistent, reliable, and happy to be measured on daily volume and clear KPIs

- Stable internet connection and a quiet environment to work

- Reliable power and internet backup setup (battery, mobile data, or co-working fallback)



Preferred:

- Experience with Instagram DMs specifically

- Background or interest in fitness, strength training, or rehab

- Familiarity with Meta Business Suite





HIRING PROCESS



We care more about how you write and think in DMs than your CV.



Step 1 — Application Filter

Submit:

- A short Loom video (max 3 minutes) answering: who you are, your DM/appointment-setting experience, and why you like high-volume, target-driven work

- Short written answers: describe your past DM/chat-based sales experience, what DM volume you've handled daily before, and what hours you can reliably work (UK time) 6 days/week



Step 2 — DM Writing Test

We send you 3 real or realistic DM conversations, each cut off mid-thread. Your task: write the next 3 messages in each conversation to build rapport, clarify the injury/problem and goal, and move toward booking a £99 assessment.



Step 3 — Live DM Simulation (Final Interview)

30–45 minute Zoom call where we roleplay: new inbound lead, ghosted/follow-up lead, and price/timing objection. You write replies in real time while we watch and coach. We're looking for speed, coachability, and natural written communication.



Step 4 — Offer + 2-Week Paid Trial

If successful, we offer the role with a 2-week paid trial (£200 base + £40 per showed assessment), clear targets (6+ showed assessments, DM volume, quality checks). Hit targets and follow the system = full ongoing agreement.





COMMUNICATION AND ESCALATION



- The founder will typically be unavailable during your shift hours

- If you encounter a situation not covered by the scripts, screenshot the conversation, WhatsApp it to the team, and move on to the next lead

- Batch your questions and send them at the end of your shift for review the next morning

- Hard rule: Never improvise on pricing, offers, guarantees, or promises. If it's not in the script, don't say it. Park the conversation and flag it.





TIME-OFF POLICY



- Planned time off requires a minimum of 21 days' notice

- If unexpected circumstances prevent you from completing your shift, inform us as soon as possible so coverage can be arranged





Strength Physiotherapy — Helping serious lifters get back to training without fear of re-injury.

title: Short-Form Video Editor Wanted (TikTok, Youtube, instagram)
description:
Read fully before applying.



Crep Therapy is an urban-luxury sneaker care brand built on culture, quality, and content. Our ASMR shoe cleaning videos have generated millions of views. Our format works, now we’re refining it.



We’re looking for a short-form editor who understands retention, pacing, and algorithm psychology, not just cutting clips together, but engineering videos that hold attention. This is not a “basic cut” role. This is for someone who thinks like a performance strategist and wants to elevate content beyond what it currently is.



Your Mission



1) Turn raw shoe cleaning/ restoration footage into high-retention TikToks, Instagram Reels, and Youtube Shorts.

2) Work confidently with ProRes RAW footage and apply professional colour grading, including effective use of LUTs.

2) Improve the first 1–3 seconds to maximise hook rate

3) Reduce viewer drop-off through pacing, sequencing, and tension

4) Strengthen loop psychology and replay value

5) Suggest format upgrades, new structures, and creative shifts

6) Help evolve our ASMR style into something more refined and recognisable



We don’t want stale edits, we want someone who challenges and upgrades the system.



What We’re Looking For:



1) Strong understanding of TikTok, IG Reels, and YouTube Shorts performance

2) Proof of videos that have performed well (views, retention, or engagement)

3) Sharp instinct for rhythm, sound design, and visual flow

4) Confidence to suggest improvements instead of waiting for instructions

5) Comfortable working with Google Drive and fast feedback cycles



If you just assemble clips, this isn’t for you. If you study why videos work, keep reading.



How We Work



1) Consistent weekly volume

2) Clear briefs, fast approvals

3) Direct communication via Whatsapp

4) Freedom to experiment and improve

5) Compensation is based on skill, impact, and level of ownership. We pay according to value delivered.



To Apply



Send:



1) Send your most successful short-form edits (strongest work only). Include performance metrics if available.

2) Review our 

3) Provide a short breakdown explaining exactly what you would change in our content and why.

4) Share one specific idea you would test immediately to increase retention.

5) Confirm your editing software, ProRes RAW capability, and colour grading workflow.

6) Confirm how many years you have been editing.

7) Shortlisted applicants may be asked to complete a short test edit.



We are not looking for a gig filler. We are looking for someone who wants to build and evolve with us.



If you scroll like a strategist and edit like a creator — apply.

title: REMOTE HOTEL OPERATIONS LEADER
description:
UK-Based Hotel Group | Full-Time | Leadership Track | Fixed Salary + UK-Level Benefits

Work Directly With UK Hotel Owners. Build the Future of Scottish Hospitality.



? THE ROLE



We are hiring a Senior Hospitality Operations Manager (Remote – Philippines) to become the first Philippines-based leader for BIDE Hotels, a fast-scaling UK hotel and aparthotel group.



This is not a VA role.

This is not a support position.

This is a leadership opportunity.



You will work directly with the founders and oversee:



Multi-property hotel operations



Revenue management coordination



Guest experience systems



Remote team management (future PH hires under you)



Technology-driven unmanned hotel systems



You will help us build the operational backbone of a UK hotel brand from day one.



This role will initially support UK properties remotely and will evolve into leading a Philippines-based operations team as we scale.



???? ABOUT BIDE HOTELS



We acquire and transform heritage properties across Scotland into premium aparthotels and modern hospitality assets.



Our model combines:



Commercial property investment



Unmanned hotel technology



Energy-sector contractor demand



Tourism-driven revenue



Centralised remote operations



We currently operate multiple properties and are scaling aggressively.



This hire is critical to that growth.

???? FOUNDER-LED. FAMILY-BUILT. VISION-DRIVEN.



BIDE Hotels is a young, founder-led hospitality group built by a Scottish entrepreneurial family.



We are not a corporate chain.



We are building something with intent.



Our mission is to restore, elevate and modernise heritage properties across Scotland — combining technology, commercial strategy and pride in our home country.



We care deeply about:



Scottish heritage



High operational standards



Long-term asset building



Creating a hospitality brand that outlasts us



This is not just a business to us.



It is a legacy project.



If you join us, you are not joining a job.

You are joining a build phase.



???? PACKAGE (UK-Level Structure)



Fixed monthly salary (paid via PayPal)



Full-time contract (fixed term with long-term potential)



30 days paid annual leave



Paid public holidays (aligned with UK structure)



Private health insurance (for you + immediate household family)



Leadership growth path inside the company



Direct access to founders and strategic decisions



This is a stable, long-term opportunity — not freelance work.



???? WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR



We want a hospitality professional with deep experience, maturity, and strategic thinking.



Minimum Requirements (Non-Negotiable):



University degree in Hospitality Management, Business Management, or equivalent



Minimum 10 years experience in hotels or hospitality operations



Experience managing multi-department hotel operations



Fluent written and spoken English (professional UK-level communication)



Strong technology competence



Experience with PMS systems (Mews preferred)



Experience with revenue tools (PriceLabs or similar)



Experience with channel managers (Siteminder or similar)



Experience managing remote teams



Own computer (high performance)



Fast, stable internet connection



Quiet professional home office



???? WHAT YOU MUST BE CAPABLE OF



You must be able to:



Run daily hotel operations remotely



Monitor occupancy, ADR, and RevPAR performance



Coordinate housekeeping schedules via systems



Oversee automated check-in processes



Manage OTA listings and reputation



Handle escalated guest issues professionally



Analyse financial performance monthly



Improve SOPs and operational systems



Lead and train future Philippines-based hires



Work UK hours overlap when required



You must think like an operator, not an assistant.



???? WHY THIS ROLE IS DIFFERENT



Most PH-based hospitality roles are support roles.



This one is not.



You will:



Build systems before they break



Shape the future remote operations structure



Work on commercial hotel projects (not Airbnb hosting)



Gain exposure to UK commercial real estate



Operate inside a brand that is trademark registered in the UK



Help scale a portfolio targeting £100k+ monthly revenue growth



This is a rare opportunity to be early inside a growing international hospitality group.



?? WHO THIS IS NOT FOR



Do not apply if:



You have only front desk experience



You have only Airbnb hosting experience



You need constant supervision



You are uncomfortable with accountability



You prefer routine over building systems



You do not understand commercial hospitality performance metrics



We are hiring an A-player. Not someone who wants to “try”.



???? GROWTH PATH



Year 1:



Lead remote operations for UK portfolio



Build systems and SOPs



Support founders directly



Year 2:



Build and manage Philippines operations team



Become Head of Remote Operations



Long-Term:



Potential senior leadership within international hospitality group



???? HOW TO APPLY



Submit:



CV (PDF format)



Short video (2–3 minutes) answering:



Why you believe you are qualified to lead UK hotel operations remotely



What PMS and revenue tools you have used



One operational challenge you solved in a hotel and how



Internet speed test screenshot



List of all hospitality systems you have worked with



Applications without video will not be reviewed.



If you are ambitious, disciplined, and ready to build something meaningful with a UK-based hotel brand — apply.



We are hiring one leader.



Not five assistants.

description:
We're Breathpage — Europe's leading website agency building digital empires for ambitious entrepreneurs. We're a remote-first team that moves fast, communicates clearly, and operates with synergy across every project.



We're looking for a Sales Development Representative who's hungry to grow, takes ownership of their pipeline, and thrives in a role where no interaction gets missed and every message is intentional so that you can be compensated as we grow with more earning opportunities on top of the base salary.



Next to Breathpage, you’ll also work closely with our CEO to support sales activities with a media/PR offer.



In this position, you will be fulfilling and overseeing sales activities that directly support a hybrid of offers. At Breathpage, we foster synergetic relationships, both within our team and with our clients, to empower each other.





# What You'll Be Doing:



Sales Outreach (Primary Focus)



- Manage daily LinkedIn outreach across multiple accounts and campaigns

- Manage Daily Outreach via
 with multiple accounts and campaigns

- Pro-actively oversee all outreach activities

- Building genuine connections with prospects



Project & Operational Support



- Manage podcast outreach and guest planning

- Help fulfill and reach out for consulting audits that we actively do

- People Case Studies to work out consulting

- Understand organizational platforms like Notion



# What We're Looking For:



- Exceptional verbal and written communication skills.

- Adaptability and pro-active behaviour.

- Flexibility & ownership

- Familiarity with LinkedIn outreach tools,
 sequencing tools and sales



What You'll Grow Into:

This role is built for someone who wants to become a Sales Manager at Breathpage. As you prove your competency and results, the ceiling rises with you. We invest in our people — if you show ownership, you'll earn leadership.



Why Breathpage:



- Remote-first, globally operating team

- Work directly with the founder on strategy and outreach

- Clear growth path from rep ? sales manager

- A brand with a real reputation — 428+ clients, 10+ industries, a platform used across the globe

- We don't micromanage (only the first few weeks)— we trust competence and want you to grow personally and professionally



## Compensation & Setup:



- Flexible working hours during morning/afternoon CET times

- Roughly 4-6 hours a day for 4-5 days in the week

- Base salary of $500 (paid through Wise or Crypto)

- Payments done monthly, during your set up you will get a payment for first two weeks and after adjust to monthly schedule

title: EXPERIENCED | Static Ad / Image Editor & Creator | Graphic design | Hard-Working & Creative
description:
We hire only the best performing VA's that have a long-term vision when applying.

Innovation, growth and hard-work is what we believe, character comes first.





If you love design, creativity, and pushing yourself to grow, keep reading.



+ We’re looking for someone who is:

-Responsible and consistent

-Extremely attentive to visual details and aesthetics

-Creative-minded and always curious to improve their design skills

-Comfortable in graphic design

-Comfortable using AI as a productivity or creative assistant

-Always looking for ways to uplift the company, not just doing the work but innovating it

-Going to read everything and respond with uplift

-Open to feedback and eager to improve with every project



You’ll be creating static advertisements for social media and high-quality product images for product pages, two crucial visual pillars of any e-commerce store.



We don’t care about degrees or titles. What matters is your creativity, mindset, and hunger to learn and grow.





+ What You'll Gain

- A chance to turn your creative eye into real, high-impact work seen by millions of people

- Step-by-step guidance and training on what makes ads and product visuals convert

- A healthy work-life balance with respect for your time and focus

- A stable, long-term role in a growing e-commerce environment

- Flat starting rate with clear growth opportunities and performance-based bonuses

- 20 to 40 hours per week depending on your performance

- A collaborative team that values your ideas and initiative



This is not just a design job. It’s a creative growth opportunity for someone who wants to become a key visual pillar in our company.





? How to Apply ?



Please answer the questions below honestly and thoroughly.



Full Name:

Internet Speed (upload & download):

Your CV or Resume:

Your Design Portfolio (link or attachments):



Do you have experience creating static ads or product images?

Why do you think you’re perfect for this role?

How can you help our company rise up and beyond?

title: Video Editor
description: Looking for an editor for a YouTube channel consisting mostly of reaction and commentary content. Multiple uploads weekly. Quick turnarounds with light editing. Transitions, assembly, audio, and video deliverables. We mostly use DaVinci Resolve but knowledge of other NLE's is fine. Potentially live stream clipping down the line. Thumbnail design would be a plus.

title: n8n Automation Specialist — Workflows, AI & Systems (Part-Time)
description:
Breathpage is Europe's leading website agency, we build digital empires for ambitious entrepreneurs across 10+ industries globally. Behind every empire we deliver, there's an ecosystem of systems running seamlessly in the background.

We're looking for an experienced n8n Automation Specialist who can take ownership of our self-hosted n8n server, advance our internal operations, and build client-facing automation solutions that we can package and deliver as a service.



This starts part-time, but for the right person who proves their value, we are actively building this into a full-time role as we scale our automation offering to clients.





# What You'll Be Doing:



Internal Breathpage Operations



- Build, maintain, and improve automation workflows on our self-hosted n8n server

- Identify and eliminate manual bottlenecks across our sales, marketing, fulfillment, and operations

- Integrate our existing tools (CRM, Notion,
 platforms, LinkedIn, and more) into seamless automated systems

- Connect AI agents and LLM-powered logic into operational workflows where relevant



Client Automation Delivery



- Implement custom n8n automations for Breathpage clients based on their business needs

- Translate client processes and SOPs into scalable, clean workflows

- Document all workflows clearly so clients and the team can understand and maintain them

- Collaborate with the Breathpage team to identify what automation use cases we can productize and offer at scale



Strategic Growth (The Opportunity)



- Proactively surface new automation opportunities, both internal and for clients

- Help shape Breathpage's automation service offering as we develop it into a standalone product

- As volume grows, this role evolves into a full-time Automation Lead position





What We're Looking For



- Proven, hands-on n8n experience — not just familiarity, you've built and deployed real, complex workflows in production

- Ability to integrate tools like Notion, CRMs, Google Workspace,
 platforms and more

- Ownership mindset, you find the problem, you fix it, you document it

- Clear written communication



What You Won't Find Here:



- Micromanagement

- Vague briefs with no context

- A company that doesn't invest in its people



What You Will Find:



- Direct access to the founder

- A fast-moving team where your work has real, visible impact

- A role you can grow — we're intentionally building this into a full service line

- Real client projects across industries including SaaS, consulting, e-commerce, and creator businesses





Setup & Compensation:



- Hours: Part-time (~15–20 hrs/week to start)

- Rate: ~$
/month (paid through Wise or Crypto)

- Payments done monthly, during your set up you will get a payment for first two weeks and after adjust to monthly schedule





To Apply:



Please include:



1. A short description of the most complex n8n workflow you've built

2. Your experience with self-hosted n8n

3. Any examples of client-facing automations you've delivered

title: Full-Time RedTrack & Cloudflare Technical Specialist for Meta Ads
description:
???? Full-Time Technical Ads Specialist



Meta Ads | Google Ads | RedTrack | Cloudflare | Incognition

Full-Time | Remote | Long-Term Position



We are a fast-growing performance marketing business focused on Meta Ads and Google Ads.



We are looking for a HIGHLY technical person who understands tracking, domains, and ad account infrastructure at an expert level.



This is a full-time, long-term role.



???? Your Main Responsibility



You will manage and maintain our complete technical ads infrastructure.



Your tasks include:



Setting up and managing RedTrack



Managing domains inside Cloudflare



DNS setup (A records, CNAME, SSL, redirects, proxy settings)



Connecting domains to tracking systems



Setting up Meta Pixel and Conversion API (CAPI)



Setting up Google tracking (GTM, conversion tracking)



Working with anti-detect browsers like Incognition



Managing Business Managers and ad account structure



Fixing tracking issues quickly



Making sure attribution works correctly



? REQUIRED (Must Have)



You must have strong experience with:



RedTrack (very important)



Cloudflare (DNS + security + SSL)



Meta Ads technical setup



Google Ads tracking setup



Server-to-server tracking



Working with anti-detect browsers (Incognition or similar)



If you do NOT have experience with these tools, please do not apply.



? Big Advantage (Not required but preferred)



Experience in affiliate marketing



Experience with cloaking setups



VPS / hosting experience



API integrations



Automation experience



???? We Need Someone Who Is:



Very detail-oriented



Fast at solving technical problems



Independent (can work without constant supervision)



Honest and reliable



Available full-time



???? What We Offer



Full-time remote position



Stable, long-term work



Competitive salary



Performance bonuses possible



Opportunity to grow with the company



???? How to Apply



Please send:



A short introduction about yourself



Your experience with RedTrack and Cloudflare



Examples of tracking setups you built



Your expected monthly salary (USD)



When you can start





???? VERY IMPORTANT – READ BEFORE APPLYING



If you do NOT have strong, real experience with RedTrack, please DO NOT apply.



This position is 100?pendent on RedTrack.

You must be able to:



Build complete RedTrack setups from scratch



Connect domains properly



Set up postbacks and server-to-server tracking



Configure traffic sources correctly



Troubleshoot tracking issues independently



Understand attribution and tracking logic deeply



If you have only “basic knowledge” or watched tutorials, this job is NOT for you.



We are NOT looking for someone who wants to learn RedTrack.

We are looking for someone who already masters it.



If you cannot confidently handle everything inside RedTrack without guidance, please do not send an application.

title: Online Arbitrage VA FRANCE ITALY GERMANY MARKETPLACE – 10–15 Leads/Day – Keepa Expert – Long-Term Position

This is a long-term position for someone who is reliable, skilled, and able to work independently.

Manual sourcing

SellerAmp



Keepa (advanced use required)



Profit Path



Brand sourcing



Suppliers research

? Keepa (price history, Buy Box rotation, drops per month, competition analysis)

title: UK Corporate Immigration – Demand & Authority Lead
description:
(Marcus Sheridan's Endless Customers | Compliance & Sponsor Licence Focus).



Immtell is a UK-based immigration consultancy specialising in:



- Sponsor licence applications

- Sponsor licence compliance & mock audits

- Skilled Worker visa strategy

- UK market entry & company formation support



We are intentionally narrowing our focus to UK corporate immigration and compliance risk, moving away from broad global mobility services.



We are looking for one senior, commercially minded operator to help lead this repositioning and build high-quality corporate demand.



This is not a social media role.

This is not a virtual assistant role.

This is not a blog production role.



This is a strategic growth role.



----



The Objective:



Increase the quality of corporate enquiries, particularly for:



- Sponsor licence applications

- Compliance reviews / mock audits

- Governance & allocation strategy



Reduce low-value, piecemeal work.



---



What You Will Own:



You will work directly with the founder and take responsibility for:



Positioning & Strategy -



- Refining Immtell’s UK-focused corporate positioning

- Defining and sharpening ideal client profiles

- Building compliance-risk narratives that resonate with corporate decision-makers



Authority-Led Content (You Create It)- 



- Writing and structuring all strategic content (blogs, landing pages, pricing content, LinkedIn drafts, etc.)

- Applying Endless Customers principles (important): Pricing transparency, Problems & objections, Comparisons, Industry disruption, and Assignment selling.

- Structuring content so it supports AI search visibility naturally (no gimmicks)



Demand & Lead Quality - 



- Aligning content with sales conversations

- Improving enquiry quality, not just increasing traffic

- Supporting targeted outreach or strategic visibility initiatives



Tools & Execution - 



You will actively use:



- priceguide.ai (pricing transparency)

- Ubersuggest (keyword research & structure)

- AI tools for workflow efficiency

- Hubspot CRM thinking aligned with sales



You must be comfortable owning both strategy and execution.



---



Leadership & Ownership (Important):



This is not a task-based role. You are expected to:



- Propose positioning changes

- Challenge assumptions constructively

- Bring strategic ideas, not wait for instructions

- Identify opportunities proactively

- Take ownership of outcomes, not just deliverables



You will not receive daily step-by-step tasks.



If you prefer clear instructions over strategic ownership, this role is not a fit.



---



The Type of Person This Suits:



You may have experience as:



- Demand Generation Manager (B2B)

- Marketing Manager (Professional Services)

- Growth Lead

- Inbound Marketing Lead

- Sales-Aligned Marketing Strategist



You think in terms of - 



- Pipeline quality

- ICP discipline

- Revenue impact

- Buyer psychology in regulated industries

- Long-term authority building



If your focus is primarily on social engagement, followers, or traffic metrics, this role is not suitable.



---



What Success Looks Like (6–12 Months):



- Clear UK corporate positioning

- Improved quality of sponsor licence & compliance enquiries

- Content actively used in sales conversations

- Greater visibility among UK corporate decision-makers

- Reduced low-value enquiries



This role directly supports revenue.



---



Requirements:



- Strong written and verbal English

- Experience owning B2B demand or marketing strategy end-to-end

- Ability to create structured, authority-led content independently

- Comfortable working directly with a founder

- Commercial mindset

- Experience in professional services, SaaS, legal, compliance, or consulting environments is preferred.



---



Working Arrangement:



- Remote 

- Full-time

- Long-term contractor role

- Monthly compensation: $2,000 – $2,500 USD depending on experience

- 90-day review period



---



To Apply:



Please include:



- How would you reposition a UK immigration firm to attract higher-quality corporate clients?

- How would you improve lead quality without simply increasing traffic?

- Provide one example of content you would create to support a sponsor licence compliance audit service.



Applications focused only on social media growth or traffic metrics will not be considered.

title: Sales Associate (Remote)
description:

In this position, you will communicate with potential clients through live chat, develop strong working relationships, and turn conversations into successful sales. We are seeking someone who is proactive, resilient, and motivated to consistently meet and exceed targets.



Candidate Requirements:



Previous experience in sales, particularly in online, digital, or outbound roles



Strong written English with fast and accurate typing skills



Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities, with patience, persistence, and a positive attitude



A dependable laptop and stable internet connection (this is a fully remote role)



Compensation & Benefits:



Base salary of $700 with a performance-based commission structure. High performers earn well above the base salary



Flexible remote work, allowing you to operate from your most productive environment



A supportive and collaborative team culture focused on growth and long-term success



If you are confident in managing client interactions, capable of handling objections, and driven by results, we encourage you to apply and join our growing team.

title: FTC & CFPB Dispute Filer
description:
?? READ BEFORE APPLYING



If you’ve never filed FTC Identity Theft Reports or CFPB complaints before — do NOT apply.

We are not training beginners.

We are building a results-driven compliance team.

We need someone who understands:

How to structure FTC reports strategically

How to file CFPB complaints that demand bureau accountability

How to track 30-day investigation timelines

How to escalate properly when bureaus fail to comply



You will be responsible for: 

Filing FTC Identity Theft Reports correctly and strategically

Drafting and submitting CFPB complaints with strong legal framing

Tracking responses from Experian, Equifax, and TransUnion

Monitoring compliance deadlines

Following up aggressively but professionally

Updating CRM and maintaining airtight documentation

Identifying violations under FCRA §§ 609, 611, 623



We expect precision. No sloppy submissions. No missed deadlines.

If you know the FCRA inside and out — keep reading.
